href="?css=print" title="Print">print</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;·&nbsp;&nbsp; <a href="" style="color:#aeaeae;" title="Change Text Size" id="inc" class="defaultSize">T</a>&nbsp;<a href="" style="font-size:18px;" title="Change Text Size" id="inc" class="largeSize">T</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;<script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">var min=8;var max=18;var min1=18;var max1=24; /* set cookie functions */function setCookie (name,value,days) {if (days){var date = new Date();date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));var expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();}else var expires = "";document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";}function getCookie (name) {var nameEQ = name + "=";var ca = document.cookie.split(';');for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++){var c = ca[i];while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);}return null;}function increaseFontSize(e) {e.preventDefault();$(this).css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".defaultSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});var temp=document.getElementById('inc').innerHTMLvar p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {if(p[i].style.fontSize) {var s = parseInt(p[i].style.fontSize.replace("px",""));} else {var s = 18;}if(s!=max) {s = 18;}if(p[i].style.lineHeight) {var t = parseInt(p[i].style.lineHeight.replace("px","")); } else {var t = 24; }if(t!=max1) {t = 24; } p[i].style.fontSize = s+"px"p[i].style.lineHeight = t+"px"} // save the font size in a cookie for one daysetCookie('fontsize', s, 1);setCookie('lineheight', t, 1);}function decreaseFontSize(e) {e.preventDefault();var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');	$(this).css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".largeSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});	for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {if(p[i].style.fontSize) {var s = parseInt(p[i].style.fontSize.replace("px",""));} else {var s = 14;}if(s!=min) {s =14;}if(p[i].style.lineHeight) {var t = parseInt(p[i].style.lineHeight.replace("px","")); } else {var t = 18; }if(t!=min1) {t = 18; } p[i].style.lineHeight = t+"px"p[i].style.fontSize = s+"px"} // save the font size in a cookie for one daysetCookie('fontsize', s, 1);setCookie('lineheight', t, 1);}$(document).ready(function() {// if the cookie exists, restore the variablevar fontsize = getCookie('fontsize');var lineheight = getCookie('lineheight'); if (fontsize) {var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {document.getElementsByTagName('p')[i].style.fontSize = fontsize + 'px' ; }if(fontsize > 16){$(".largeSize").css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".defaultSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});}}if (lineheight) {var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {document.getElementsByTagName('p')[i].style.lineHeight = lineheight + 'px' }}$(".defaultSize").click(decreaseFontSize);$(".largeSize").click(increaseFontSize);});</script><NOSCRIPT><a persons, including two children and seven women, injured when a wall collapsed over them here.</p><p class="body"> Two of the injured women were referred to a Delhi hospital in a critical condition while the rest were being treated at Bulandshahr.</p><p class="body"> The incident took place at Jevar village in Greater Noida when the women were viewing a marriage procession, standing on a <a href="" style="color:#aeaeae;" title="Change Text Size" id="inc" class="defaultSize">T</a>&nbsp;<a href="" style="font-size:18px;" title="Change Text Size" id="inc" class="largeSize">T</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;<script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">var min=8;var max=18;var min1=18;var max1=24; /* set cookie functions */function setCookie (name,value,days) {if (days){var date = new Date();date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));var expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();}else var expires = "";document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";}function getCookie (name) {var nameEQ = name + "=";var ca = document.cookie.split(';');for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++){var c = ca[i];while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);}return null;}function increaseFontSize(e) {e.preventDefault();$(this).css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".defaultSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});var temp=document.getElementById('inc').innerHTMLvar p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {if(p[i].style.fontSize) {var s = parseInt(p[i].style.fontSize.replace("px",""));} else {var s = 18;}if(s!=max) {s = 18;}if(p[i].style.lineHeight) {var t = parseInt(p[i].style.lineHeight.replace("px","")); } else {var t = 24; }if(t!=max1) {t = 24; } p[i].style.fontSize = s+"px"p[i].style.lineHeight = t+"px"} // save the font size in a cookie for one daysetCookie('fontsize', s, 1);setCookie('lineheight', t, 1);}function decreaseFontSize(e) {e.preventDefault();var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');	$(this).css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".largeSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});	for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {if(p[i].style.fontSize) {var s = parseInt(p[i].style.fontSize.replace("px",""));} else {var s = 14;}if(s!=min) {s =14;}if(p[i].style.lineHeight) {var t = parseInt(p[i].style.lineHeight.replace("px","")); } else {var t = 18; }if(t!=min1) {t = 18; } p[i].style.lineHeight = t+"px"p[i].style.fontSize = s+"px"} // save the font size in a cookie for one daysetCookie('fontsize', s, 1);setCookie('lineheight', t, 1);}$(document).ready(function() {// if the cookie exists, restore the variablevar fontsize = getCookie('fontsize');var lineheight = getCookie('lineheight'); if (fontsize) {var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {document.getElementsByTagName('p')[i].style.fontSize = fontsize + 'px' ; }if(fontsize > 16){$(".largeSize").css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".defaultSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});}}if (lineheight) {var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {document.getElementsByTagName('p')[i].style.lineHeight = lineheight + 'px' }}$(".defaultSize").click(decreaseFontSize);$(".largeSize").click(increaseFontSize);});</script><NOSCRIPT><a href="http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-national/tp-andhrapradesh/roadwidening-works-inspected/article1563699.ece?textsize=large&test=1" title="Large Text Size" >T+</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;·&nbsp;&nbsp; Ramanjaneyulu inspected Karampudi - Dachepalli road-widening works on Tuesday. He instructed officials to expedite the work and ensure strict compliance with rules. Compensation would be paid in respect of shops and residences demolished for widening the road. The Government had sanctioned adequate funds for the purpose.</p><p class="body">Mr. Ramanjaneyulu said no leniency would be shown to those who had encroached upon the road while doing justice to those who voluntarily allowed their dwellings and business establishments to be partially / fully demolished to facilitate road expansion.</p><p class="body">A meeting would be organised in Guntur on March 29 to discuss the issues related to road-widening works in the district.</p><p class="body">Additional Joint Collector K Yakub Naik, Narsaraopet RDO K Srinivasulu and Roads and Buildings Department SE B Nageswara Rao accompanied the Collector. </p><script type="text/javascript">$(function() {$('#articleKeywords a').click( function() { var keyword = $(this).text();if (keyword.indexOf(' ') != -1)$('input#searchString').attr("value", '"' + keyword + '"');else$('input#searchString').attr("value", keyword);$('#simpleSearchForm').submit();return false;});});</script><div class="breadcr"><h3 class="artbcrumb"> <div class="todayslink">&raquo; Today&#039;s Paper&raquo; ANDHRA PRADESH</div></h3></span><span class="dateline"><span class="upper">KURNOOL,</span>March 23, 2011</span></div><div class="line zero15"></div><h1 class="detail-title">Two killed in road accident</h1><script type="text/javascript"><!--// These variables are for maintaining state when using ad skipvar google_num_ads = 0;var google_last_ad_type = '';function google_ad_request_done(google_ads) {/** This function is required and is used to display* the ads that are returned from the JavaScript* request. You should modify the document.write* commands so that the HTML they write out fits* with your desired ad layout.*/var s;/** Verify that there are actually ads to display.*/if (google_ads.length == 0)return;google_num_ads += google_ads.length;google_last_ad_type = google_ads[0].type;/** If an image or Flash ad is returned, display that ad.* If a rich media ad is returned, display that as "as is."* Otherwise, build a string containing all of the ads and* then use a document.write() command to print that string.*/s = '<div id="google-ad-border">';if (google_ads[0].type == "image") {s += '<a href="' + google_ads[0].url +'" target="_top" title="go to ' + google_ads[0].visible_url +'"><img border="0" src="' + google_ads[0].image_url +'"width="' + google_ads[0].image_width +'"height="' + google_ads[0].image_height + '"></a>';}else if (google_ads[0].type == "flash") {s += '<object classid="clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000"' +' codebase="http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,0,0"' +' WIDTH="' + google_ad.image_width +'" HEIGHT="' + google_ad.image_height + '">' +'<PARAM NAME="movie" VALUE="' + google_ad.image_url + '">' +'<PARAM NAME="quality" VALUE="high">' +'<PARAM NAME="AllowScriptAccess" VALUE="never">' +'<EMBED src="' + google_ad.image_url +'" WIDTH="' + google_ad.image_width +'" HEIGHT="' + google_ad.image_height +'" TYPE="application/x-shockwave-flash"' +' AllowScriptAccess="never" ' +' PLUGINSPAGE="http://www.macromedia.com/go/getflashplayer"></EMBED></OBJECT>';}else if (google_ads[0].type == "html") {s += google_ads[0].snippet;}else if (google_ads[0].type == "text") {// Adjust text sizes to occupy the majority of ad space.if (google_ads.length == 1) {ad_title_class = 'ad_title_small';ad_text_class = 'ad_text_small';ad_url_class = 'ad_url_small';} else {ad_title_class = 'ad_title';ad_text_class = 'ad_text';ad_url_class = 'ad_url';}for(var i=0; i < google_ads.length; i++) {s += '<div class="ad_no_background"><a class="' + ad_title_class + '" href="' + google_ads[i].url + '" target="_blank">' +google_ads[i].line1 + '</a> - <span class="' + ad_text_class + '">' +google_ads[i].line2 + ' ' +google_ads[i].line3 + '</span> ' +'<a class="' + ad_url_class + '" href="' + google_ads[i].url + '" target="_blank" >' +google_ads[i].visible_url + '</a></div><div class="ad_label"><a class="ad_attrheadbelow" href="'+google_info.feedback_url+'" target="_blank">Ads by Google</a></div></div>';}}document.write(s);return;}// --></script><script type="text/javascript"><!--/** This section is responsible for setting the parameters of the ad call* Customize this section to your needs with input from your account manager*/// The following parameters should be modified appropriatelygoogle_ad_client = 'ca-hindu_site_html'; // substitute your client_idgoogle_ad_channel = '6568152145'; // substitute your channelgoogle_ad_output = 'js'; // leave this value as jsgoogle_max_num_ads = '1'; // specify the number of maximum adsgoogle_ad_type = 'text'; // type of ads to display - text,image,flash,htmlgoogle_safe = 'high'; // specify the ad safetygoogle_feedback = 'on';// The following parameter is required if you are displaying image, Flash or rich media ads.google_image_size = '468x60'; // the size of the ad block// The following parameters are options you can specify as necessary// google_encoding = 'utf8'; // specify the output language of the ads// google_language = 'en'; // override the default page language// The following parameter should be used only during testing// google_adtest = 'on'; // remove this line on launch day// --></script><!--/** The JavaScript returned from the following page uses* the parameter values assigned above to populate an array* of ad objects. Once that array has been populated,* the JavaScript will call the google_ad_request_done* function to display the ads.*/--><script type="text/javascript" src="http://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/show_ads.js"></script><script type="text/javascript">var addthis_pub = "thehindu";</script><div class="detail-info"><div class="article-links"><a href="?css=print" title="Print">print</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;·&nbsp;&nbsp; <a href="" style="color:#aeaeae;" title="Change Text Size" id="inc" class="defaultSize">T</a>&nbsp;<a href="" style="font-size:18px;" title="Change Text Size" id="inc" class="largeSize">T</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;<script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">var min=8;var max=18;var min1=18;var max1=24; /* set cookie functions */function setCookie (name,value,days) {if (days){var date = new Date();date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));var expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();}else var expires = "";document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";}function getCookie (name) {var nameEQ = name + "=";var ca = document.cookie.split(';');for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++){var c = ca[i];while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);}return null;}function increaseFontSize(e) {e.preventDefault();$(this).css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".defaultSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});var temp=document.getElementById('inc').innerHTMLvar p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {if(p[i].style.fontSize) {var s = parseInt(p[i].style.fontSize.replace("px",""));} else {var s = 18;}if(s!=max) {s = 18;}if(p[i].style.lineHeight) {var t = parseInt(p[i].style.lineHeight.replace("px","")); } else {var t = 24; }if(t!=max1) {t = 24; } p[i].style.fontSize = s+"px"p[i].style.lineHeight = t+"px"} // save the font size in a cookie for one daysetCookie('fontsize', s, 1);setCookie('lineheight', t, 1);}function decreaseFontSize(e) {e.preventDefault();var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');	$(this).css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".largeSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});	for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {if(p[i].style.fontSize) {var s = parseInt(p[i].style.fontSize.replace("px",""));} else {var s = 14;}if(s!=min) {s =14;}if(p[i].style.lineHeight) {var t = parseInt(p[i].style.lineHeight.replace("px","")); } else {var t = 18; }if(t!=min1) {t = 18; } p[i].style.lineHeight = t+"px"p[i].style.fontSize = s+"px"} // save the font size in a cookie for one daysetCookie('fontsize', s, 1);setCookie('lineheight', t, 1);}$(document).ready(function() {// if the cookie exists, restore the variablevar fontsize = getCookie('fontsize');var lineheight = getCookie('lineheight'); if (fontsize) {var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {document.getElementsByTagName('p')[i].style.fontSize = fontsize + 'px' ; }if(fontsize > 16){$(".largeSize").css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".defaultSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});}}if (lineheight) {var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {document.getElementsByTagName('p')[i].style.lineHeight = lineheight + 'px' }}$(".defaultSize").click(decreaseFontSize);$(".largeSize").click(increaseFontSize);});</script><NOSCRIPT><a href="http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-national/tp-andhrapradesh/two-killed-in-road-accident/article1563092.ece?textsize=large&test=1" title="Large Text Size" >T+</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;·&nbsp;&nbsp; <a href="http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-national/tp-andhrapradesh/two-killed-in-road-accident/article1563092.ece?textsize=small&test=2" title="Small Text Size">T-</a></NOSCRIPT> </div> </div><script type="text/javascript">function toggle() {var ele = document.getElementById("topShare");var text = document.getElementById("click");if(ele.style.display == "block") {ele.style.display = "none";text.innerHTML = "Share";}else {ele.style.display = "block";text.innerHTML = "Share"; }}</script> <div id="topShare"><div id="addsharetop"><div class="fshare"><div class="fb-like" data-href="http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-national/tp-andhrapradesh/two-killed-in-road-accident/article1563092.ece" data-send="true" data-layout="button_count" data-show-faces="true" data-font="arial"> </div></div><div class="twit">	<a href="https://twitter.com/share" class="twitter-share-button" data-url="http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-national/tp-andhrapradesh/article1563092.ece" data-count="horizontal">Tweet</a></div><div class="gplus">	<g:plusone size="medium"></g:plusone></div><div class="inShare floatLeft"><script src="//platform.linkedin.com/in.js" type="text/javascript"> lang: en_US</script><script type="IN/Share" data-url="http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-national/tp-andhrapradesh/two-killed-in-road-accident/article1563092.ece" data-counter="right"></script></div><div class="twit1"><script type="text/javascript">var addthis_config = {"data_track_clickback":true, ui_click: true,services_compact: 'email, favorites, gmail, hotmail, blogger, instapaper, wordpress, more',services_exclude: 'facebook,twitter',data_ga_property: 'UA-10158580-1',data_ga_social: true}</script><a href="http://addthis.com/bookmark.php?v=250&amp;username=thehindu" class="addthis_counter addthis_pill_style" title="Share via more services"></a></div>	</div>	<div class="line2"></div></div><div class="article-text"><div class="articleLead"></div><p class="body">Two persons died and six others sustained injuries when a lorry and autorickshaw collided at Ramadurgam near Chippagiri in Kurnool district on Tuesday. 2011</span></div><div class="line zero15"></div><h1 class="detail-title">M.G. Road makeover to begin this month-end</h1><script type="text/javascript"><!--// These variables are for maintaining state when using ad skipvar google_num_ads = 0;var google_last_ad_type = '';function google_ad_request_done(google_ads) {/** This function is required and is used to display* the ads that are returned from the JavaScript* request. i < google_ads.length; i++) {s += '<div class="ad_no_background"><a class="' + ad_title_class + '" href="' + google_ads[i].url + '" target="_blank">' +google_ads[i].line1 + '</a> - <span class="' + ad_text_class + '">' +google_ads[i].line2 + ' ' +google_ads[i].line3 + '</span> ' +'<a class="' + ad_url_class + '" href="' + google_ads[i].url + '" target="_blank" >' +google_ads[i].visible_url + '</a></div><div class="ad_label"><a class="ad_attrheadbelow" href="'+google_info.feedback_url+'" target="_blank">Ads by Google</a></div></div>';}}document.write(s);return;}// --></script><script type="text/javascript"><!--/** This section is responsible for setting the parameters of the ad call* Customize this section to your needs with input from your account manager*/// The following parameters should be modified appropriatelygoogle_ad_client = 'ca-hindu_site_html'; // remove this line on launch day// --></script><!--/** The JavaScript returned from the following page uses* the parameter values assigned above to populate an array* of ad objects. Once that array has been populated,* the JavaScript will call the google_ad_request_done* function to display the ads.*/--><script type="text/javascript" src="http://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/show_ads.js"></script><script type="text/javascript">var addthis_pub = "thehindu";</script><span class="artauthor"><ul><li><a href="http://www.thehindu.com/profile/author/anil-kumar-sastry/" >ANIL KUMAR SASTRY</a></li> </ul></span>	<div class="detail-info"><div class="article-links"><a href="?css=print" title="Print">print</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;·&nbsp;&nbsp; <a href="" style="color:#aeaeae;" title="Change Text Size" id="inc" class="defaultSize">T</a>&nbsp;<a href="" style="font-size:18px;" title="Change Text Size" id="inc" class="largeSize">T</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;<script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">var min=8;var max=18;var min1=18;var max1=24; /* set cookie functions */function setCookie (name,value,days) {if (days){var date = new Date();date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));var expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();}else var expires = "";document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";}function getCookie (name) {var nameEQ = name + "=";var ca = document.cookie.split(';');for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++){var c = ca[i];while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);}return null;}function increaseFontSize(e) {e.preventDefault();$(this).css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".defaultSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});var temp=document.getElementById('inc').innerHTMLvar p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {if(p[i].style.fontSize) {var s = parseInt(p[i].style.fontSize.replace("px",""));} else {var s = 18;}if(s!=max) {s = 18;}if(p[i].style.lineHeight) {var t = parseInt(p[i].style.lineHeight.replace("px","")); } else {var t = 24; }if(t!=max1) {t = 24; } p[i].style.fontSize = s+"px"p[i].style.lineHeight = t+"px"} // save the font size in a cookie for one daysetCookie('fontsize', s, 1);setCookie('lineheight', t, 1);}function decreaseFontSize(e) {e.preventDefault();var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');	$(this).css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".largeSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});	for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {if(p[i].style.fontSize) {var s = parseInt(p[i].style.fontSize.replace("px",""));} else {var s = 14;}if(s!=min) {s =14;}if(p[i].style.lineHeight) {var t = parseInt(p[i].style.lineHeight.replace("px","")); } else {var t = 18; }if(t!=min1) {t = 18; } p[i].style.lineHeight = t+"px"p[i].style.fontSize = s+"px"} // save the font size in a cookie for one daysetCookie('fontsize', s, 1);setCookie('lineheight', t, 1);}$(document).ready(function() {// if the cookie exists, restore the variablevar fontsize = getCookie('fontsize');var lineheight = getCookie('lineheight'); if (fontsize) {var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {document.getElementsByTagName('p')[i].style.fontSize = fontsize + 'px' ; }if(fontsize > 16){$(".largeSize").css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".defaultSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});}}if (lineheight) {var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {document.getElementsByTagName('p')[i].style.lineHeight = lineheight + 'px' }}$(".defaultSize").click(decreaseFontSize);$(".largeSize").click(increaseFontSize);});</script><NOSCRIPT><a href="http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-national/tp-karnataka/mg-road-makeover-to-begin-this-monthend/article1566517.ece?textsize=large&test=1" title="Large Text Size" >T+</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;·&nbsp;&nbsp; }}</script> <div id="topShare"><div id="addsharetop"><div class="fshare"><div class="fb-like" data-href="http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-national/tp-karnataka/mg-road-makeover-to-begin-this-monthend/article1566517.ece" data-send="true" data-layout="button_count" data-show-faces="true" data-font="arial"> </div></div><div class="twit">	<a href="https://twitter.com/share" class="twitter-share-button" data-url="http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-national/tp-karnataka/article1566517.ece" data-count="horizontal">Tweet</a></div><div class="gplus">	<g:plusone size="medium"></g:plusone></div><div class="inShare floatLeft"><script src="//platform.linkedin.com/in.js" type="text/javascript"> lang: en_US</script><script type="IN/Share" data-url="http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-national/tp-karnataka/mg-road-makeover-to-begin-this-monthend/article1566517.ece" data-counter="right"></script></div><div class="pin"><a href="http://pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-national/tp-karnataka/mg-road-makeover-to-begin-this-monthend/article1566517.ece&media=http://www.thehindu.com/multimedia/dynamic/00510/23bgani-metro-updat_510570g.jpg&description=M.G. Road makeover to begin this month-end" class="pin-it-button" count-layout="horizontal"><img border="0" src="//assets.pinterest.com/images/PinExt.png" title="Pin It" /></a></div><div class="twit1"><script type="text/javascript">var addthis_config = {"data_track_clickback":true, ui_click: true,services_compact: 'email, favorites, gmail, hotmail, blogger, instapaper, wordpress, more',services_exclude: 'facebook,twitter',data_ga_property: 'UA-10158580-1',data_ga_social: true}</script><a href="http://addthis.com/bookmark.php?v=250&amp;username=thehindu" class="addthis_counter addthis_pill_style" title="Share via more services"></a></div>	</div>	<div class="line2"></div></div><div class="article-text"><div class="articleLead"></div><div class="text-embed"><img src="http://www.thehindu.com/multimedia/dynamic/00510/23bgani-metro-updat_510570e.jpg" class="main-image" alt="Changes: BMRCL plans to shift the mock-up metro coach (left) to either Cubbon Park or Lalbagh to begin work on the promenade on M.G. Road. — Photo: Bhagya Prakash K." width="318" height="167" title="Changes: BMRCL plans to shift the mock-up metro coach (left) to either Cubbon Park or Lalbagh to begin work on the promenade on M.G. Road. — Photo: Bhagya Prakash K."/><div class="photo-caption"><div class="photo-source"></div>Changes: BMRCL plans to shift the mock-up metro coach (left) to either Cubbon Park or Lalbagh to begin work on the promenade on M.G. Road. — Photo: Bhagya Prakash K.</div></div><div class="article-body"><p class="body">Finally, work on restoration of the much-loved promenade on Mahatma Gandhi Road between Anil Kumble Circle and Cauvery Emporium is likely to begin this month. </p><p class="body">The promenade was razed by the Bangalore Metro Rail Corporation Ltd., (BMRCL) in 2007 before it commenced construction of the viaduct for Namma Metro Reach 1 between Byappanahalli and Cricket Stadium.</p><p class="body">This restoration work, which will be executed by the Rajiv Gandhi Rural Housing Corporation and the Karnataka Land Army Corporation at a cost of about Rs. 7 crore, envisages an elevated walkway, besides an open-air theatre, art gallery, museum, children's play area and restrooms.</p><p class="body"><b>No response</b></p><p class="body">Sources in the BMRCL said that since the tender for revitalisation did not receive any response, the corporation decided to handover the task to the two government-owned companies.</p><p class="body">While BMRCL will revitalise this stretch of M.G. Road, which will sport an entirely new look, it is yet to be decided as to who will maintain the facilities. BMRCL spokesperson said no time-limit has been specified for completion of the project since many of the works to be executed are &#8220;concept-based&#8221;, though the official tender had specified that the work should be executed in five months.</p><p class="body">BMRCL has big plans that offer people a host of cultural events as they stroll on the post-makeover walkway.</p><p class="body"> The stretch between Anil Kumble Circle and Cauvery Emporium is around 700 metres long and 12 metres wide.</p><p class="body">The 152-seater open-air theatre will be located beneath the walkway, at the road level, near Anil Kumble Circle. </p><p class="body">A gallery to exhibit artwork, hold lecdems and workshops will come up as will a sculpture museum. Nearby, space will be provided to hold village fairs or mandis. A children's play area will come up near the metro station. </p><p class="body"><b>Mock up coach</b></p><p class="body">Meanwhile, BMRCL, which had kept a mock-up coach of Namma Metro near Anil Kumble Circle since June last year for public display, will shift the coach elsewhere.</p><p class="body">The spokesperson said BMRCL has not yet decided where to place the mock-up coach. However, places such as Cubbon Park or Lalbagh, which attract tourists, could be the better places, he said and added that the corporation would hold discussions with the Horticulture Department in this regard.</p><p class="body">Horticulture Department Director N. Jayaram told <i>The Hindu</i> that as and when such a request comes from Bangalore Metro, the same would appropriately be considered. If the mock-up coach does not disturb the surroundings, there is no issue to keep it in one of the parks where public visit in large numbers, he added.</p><p class="body">Meanwhile, Mr. Jayaram said the department had promised to lend its expertise and personnel for the revitalisation of M.G. Road promenade as well as beautification of other metro stations. </p><p class="body">ANIL KUMAR SASTRY</p><p class="body"><i><b>The restoration work envisages an elevated walkway, besides an open-air theatre, art gallery, museum and children's play area </b></i></p><script type="text/javascript">$(function() {$('#articleKeywords a').click( function() { var keyword = $(this).text();if (keyword.indexOf(' ') != -1)$('input#searchString').attr("value", '"' + keyword + '"');else$('input#searchString').attr("value", keyword);$('#simpleSearchForm').submit();return false;});});</script><div id="articleKeywords"><p></p></div><div class="clear"> </div><div class="noline"></div><div class="amzn" style="margin-bottom:15px; href="'+google_info.feedback_url+'">Ads by Google</a></div>';if (google_ads[0].type == "image") {s += '<a href="' + google_ads[0].url +'" target="_top" title="go to ' + google_ads[0].visible_url +'"><img border="0" src="' + google_ads[0].image_url +'"width="' + google_ads[0].image_width +'"height="' + google_ads[0].image_height + '"></a>';}else if (google_ads[0].type == "flash") {s += '<object classid="clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000"' +' codebase="http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,0,0"' +' WIDTH="' + google_ad.image_width +'" HEIGHT="' + google_ad.image_height + '">' +'<PARAM NAME="movie" VALUE="' + google_ad.image_url + '">' +'<PARAM NAME="quality" VALUE="high">' +'<PARAM NAME="AllowScriptAccess" VALUE="never">' +'<EMBED src="' + google_ad.image_url +'" WIDTH="' + google_ad.image_width +'" HEIGHT="' + google_ad.image_height +'" TYPE="application/x-shockwave-flash"' +' AllowScriptAccess="never" ' +' PLUGINSPAGE="http://www.macromedia.com/go/getflashplayer"></EMBED></OBJECT>';}else if (google_ads[0].type == "html") {s += google_ads[0].snippet;}else if (google_ads[0].type == "text") {// Adjust text sizes to occupy the majority of ad space.if (google_ads.length == 1) {ad_title_class = 'ad_below_title_large';ad_text_class = 'ad_below_text_large';ad_url_class = 'ad_below_url_large';} else {ad_title_class = 'ad_below_title';ad_text_class = 'ad_below_text';ad_url_class = 'ad_below_url';}for(var i=0; i < google_ads.length; i++) {s += '<div class="ad_below_background"><a class="' + ad_title_class + '" href="' + google_ads[i].url + '" >' +google_ads[i].line1 + '</a><br><span class="' + ad_text_class + '">' +google_ads[i].line2 + ' ' +google_ads[i].line3 + '</span><br>' +'<a class="' + ad_url_class + '" href="' + google_ads[i].url + '" >' +google_ads[i].visible_url + '</a><br></div>';}}document.write(s);return;}// --></script><script type="text/javascript"><!--/** This section is responsible for setting the parameters of the ad call* Customize this section to your needs with input from your account manager*/// The following parameters should be modified class="breadcr"><h3 class="artbcrumb"> <div class="todayslink">&raquo; Today&#039;s Paper&raquo; KARNATAKA</div></h3></span><span class="dateline"><span class="upper">Bangalore,</span>March 24, 2011</span></div><div class="line zero15"></div><h1 class="detail-title">On Day 1 of Cubbon Road closure, traffic jams cripple arterial roads</h1><script type="text/javascript"><!--// These variables are for maintaining state when using ad skipvar google_num_ads = 0;var google_last_ad_type = '';function google_ad_request_done(google_ads) {/** This function is required and is used to display* the ads that are returned from the JavaScript* request. You should modify the document.write* commands so that the HTML they write out fits* with your desired ad layout.*/var s;/** Verify that there are actually ads to display.*/if (google_ads.length == 0)return;google_num_ads += google_ads.length;google_last_ad_type = google_ads[0].type;/** If an image or Flash ad is returned, display that ad.* If a rich media ad is returned, display that as "as is."* Otherwise, build a string containing all of the ads and* then use a document.write() command to print that string.*/s = '<div id="google-ad-border">';if (google_ads[0].type == "image") {s += '<a href="' + google_ads[0].url +'" target="_top" title="go to ' + google_ads[0].visible_url +'"><img border="0" src="' + google_ads[0].image_url +'"width="' + google_ads[0].image_width +'"height="' + google_ads[0].image_height + '"></a>';}else if (google_ads[0].type == "flash") {s += '<object classid="clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000"' +' codebase="http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,0,0"' +' WIDTH="' + google_ad.image_width +'" HEIGHT="' + google_ad.image_height + '">' +'<PARAM NAME="movie" VALUE="' + google_ad.image_url + '">' +'<PARAM NAME="quality" VALUE="high">' +'<PARAM NAME="AllowScriptAccess" VALUE="never">' +'<EMBED src="' + google_ad.image_url +'" WIDTH="' + google_ad.image_width +'" HEIGHT="' + google_ad.image_height +'" TYPE="application/x-shockwave-flash"' +' AllowScriptAccess="never" ' +' PLUGINSPAGE="http://www.macromedia.com/go/getflashplayer"></EMBED></OBJECT>';}else if (google_ads[0].type == "html") {s += google_ads[0].snippet;}else if (google_ads[0].type == "text") {// Adjust text sizes to occupy the majority of ad space.if (google_ads.length == 1) {ad_title_class = 'ad_title_small';ad_text_class = 'ad_text_small';ad_url_class = 'ad_url_small';} else {ad_title_class = 'ad_title';ad_text_class = 'ad_text';ad_url_class = 'ad_url';}for(var i=0; i < google_ads.length; i++) {s += '<div class="ad_no_background"><a class="' + ad_title_class + '" href="' + google_ads[i].url + '" target="_blank">' +google_ads[i].line1 + '</a> - <span class="' + ad_text_class + '">' +google_ads[i].line2 + ' ' +google_ads[i].line3 + '</span> ' +'<a class="' + ad_url_class + '" href="' + google_ads[i].url + '" target="_blank" >' +google_ads[i].visible_url + '</a></div><div class="ad_label"><a class="ad_attrheadbelow" href="'+google_info.feedback_url+'" target="_blank">Ads by Google</a></div></div>';}}document.write(s);return;}// --></script><script type="text/javascript"><!--/** This section is responsible for setting the parameters of the ad call* Customize this section to your needs with input from your account manager*/// The following parameters should be modified appropriatelygoogle_ad_client = 'ca-hindu_site_html'; // substitute your client_idgoogle_ad_channel = '6568152145'; // substitute your channelgoogle_ad_output = 'js'; // leave this value as jsgoogle_max_num_ads = '1'; // specify the number of maximum adsgoogle_ad_type = 'text'; // type of ads to display - text,image,flash,htmlgoogle_safe = 'high'; // specify the ad safetygoogle_feedback = 'on';// The following parameter is required if you are displaying image, Flash or rich media ads.google_image_size = '468x60'; // the size of the ad block// The following parameters are options you can specify as necessary// google_encoding = 'utf8'; // specify the output language of the ads// google_language = 'en'; // override the default page language// The following parameter should be used only during testing// google_adtest = 'on'; // remove this line on launch day// --></script><!--/** The JavaScript returned from the following page uses* the parameter values assigned above to populate an array* of ad objects. src="http://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/show_ads.js"></script><script type="text/javascript">var addthis_pub = "thehindu";</script><span class="artauthor"><ul><li>Staff Reporter</li></ul></span>	<div class="detail-info"><div class="article-links"><a href="?css=print" title="Print">print</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;·&nbsp;&nbsp; <a href="" style="color:#aeaeae;" title="Change Text Size" id="inc" class="defaultSize">T</a>&nbsp;<a href="" style="font-size:18px;" title="Change Text Size" id="inc" class="largeSize">T</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;<script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">var min=8;var max=18;var min1=18;var max1=24; /* set cookie functions */function setCookie (name,value,days) {if (days){var date = new Date();date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));var expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();}else var expires = "";document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";}function getCookie (name) {var nameEQ = name + "=";var ca = document.cookie.split(';');for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++){var c = ca[i];while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);}return null;}function increaseFontSize(e) {e.preventDefault();$(this).css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".defaultSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});var temp=document.getElementById('inc').innerHTMLvar p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {if(p[i].style.fontSize) {var s = parseInt(p[i].style.fontSize.replace("px",""));} else {var s = 18;}if(s!=max) {s = 18;}if(p[i].style.lineHeight) {var t = parseInt(p[i].style.lineHeight.replace("px","")); } else {var t = 24; }if(t!=max1) {t = 24; } p[i].style.fontSize = s+"px"p[i].style.lineHeight = t+"px"} // save the font size in a cookie for one daysetCookie('fontsize', s, 1);setCookie('lineheight', t, 1);}function decreaseFontSize(e) {e.preventDefault();var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');	$(this).css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".largeSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});	for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {if(p[i].style.fontSize) {var s = parseInt(p[i].style.fontSize.replace("px",""));} else {var s = 14;}if(s!=min) {s =14;}if(p[i].style.lineHeight) {var t = parseInt(p[i].style.lineHeight.replace("px","")); } else {var t = 18; }if(t!=min1) {t = 18; } p[i].style.lineHeight = t+"px"p[i].style.fontSize = s+"px"} // save the font size in a cookie for one daysetCookie('fontsize', s, 1);setCookie('lineheight', t, 1);}$(document).ready(function() {// if the cookie exists, restore the variablevar fontsize = getCookie('fontsize');var lineheight = getCookie('lineheight'); if (fontsize) {var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {document.getElementsByTagName('p')[i].style.fontSize = fontsize + 'px' ; }if(fontsize > 16){$(".largeSize").css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".defaultSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});}}if (lineheight) {var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {document.getElementsByTagName('p')[i].style.lineHeight = lineheight + 'px' }}$(".defaultSize").click(decreaseFontSize);$(".largeSize").click(increaseFontSize);});</script><NOSCRIPT><a class="addthis_counter addthis_pill_style" title="Share via more services"></a></div>	</div>	<div class="line2"></div></div><div class="article-text"><div class="articleLead"><h2>Closed stretch used to see at least 15,000 PCUs per hour</h2></div><div class="text-embed"><img src="http://www.thehindu.com/multimedia/dynamic/00510/23bgmts1_Cubbon_Jam_510571e.jpg" class="main-image" alt="" width="318" height="153" title=""/><div class="photo-caption"><div class="photo-source"></div></div></div><div class="article-body"><p class="body">As expected, commuters in the central parts of the city had to struggle to reach their destinations on Wednesday as traffic was crippled due to the partial closure of Cubbon Road. </p><p class="body">The traffic police closed a stretch from BRV Junction to Minsk Square to facilitate the underground works on Namma Metro in front of Vidhana Soudha and at Minsk Square. Though the police had planned to close the stretch on both sides between BRV Junction and Minsk Square, they allowed traffic from Minsk Square to BRV Junction on Wednesday.</p><p class="body">The police said this concession would be on till they take a call on it later in the week.</p><p class="body">Even so, the closure completely choked all roads leading to Shivajinagar bus-stand and Anil Kumble Circle. Vehicles ground to a halt, stuck in serpentine jams.</p><p class="body"><b>Arterial roads</b></p><p class="body">Though the traffic police claimed they had initiated some measures to tackle the situation, there was no perceptible difference in arterial roads around Anil Kumble Circle, Queens Circle, Indian Express Circle, near BRV Parade Grounds, Brigade Road junction, Trinity Circle Junction, near Manipal Centre, Mahatma Gandhi Road, Cunningham Road, Kamaraj Road, Infantry Road and Cubbon Road itself.</p><p class="body">According to traffic police, the partially closed stretch used to witness at least 15,000 passenger car units (PCUs) per hour. </p><p class="body">&#8220;We have taken due measures to handle the situation,&#8221; said A. Nagappa, Assistant Commissioner of Police (Traffic Central sub-division).</p><p class="body">Meanwhile, the stretch between Anil Kumble Circle and Cubbon Road was converted to two-way traffic to ease the burden on other roads. Commuters from Cubbon Road and those going towards Minsk Square were redirected to pass through Anil Kumble and Queens Circle.</p><p class="body"><b>Illegal parking</b></p><p class="body">Illegal parking and footpath encroachment by the furniture sellers on Central Street and Infantry Road also contributed to the gridlocks.</p><p class="body">As usual, owners and customers of various commercial establishments and a hotel illegally parked their cars and motorcycles along the stretch in front of Hotel Empire near BRV Junction.</p><p class="body"><i><b><hr/><li>Police claimed to have taken steps to ease the situation, but there was no perceptible difference</li><li>Traffic was allowed from Minsk Square to BRV Junction on Wednesday</li></b></i></p><hr/><script type="text/javascript">$(function() {$('#articleKeywords a').click( function() { var keyword = $(this).text();if (keyword.indexOf(' ') != -1)$('input#searchString').attr("value", '"' + keyword + '"');else$('input#searchString').attr("value", keyword);$('#simpleSearchForm').submit();return false;});});</script><div id="articleKeywords"><p></p></div><div class="clear"> </div><div // remove this line on launch day// --></script><!--/** The JavaScript returned from the following page uses* the parameter values assigned above to populate an array* of ad objects. Once that array has been populated,* the JavaScript will call the google_ad_request_done* function to display the ads.*/--><script type="text/javascript" src="http://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/show_ads.js"></script><script type="text/javascript">var addthis_pub = "thehindu";</script><span class="artauthor"><ul><li>Special Correspondent</li></ul></span>	<div class="detail-info"><div class="article-links"><a href="?css=print" title="Print">print</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;·&nbsp;&nbsp; <a href="" style="color:#aeaeae;" title="Change Text Size" id="inc" class="defaultSize">T</a>&nbsp;<a href="" style="font-size:18px;" title="Change Text Size" id="inc" class="largeSize">T</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;<script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">var min=8;var max=18;var min1=18;var max1=24; /* set cookie functions */function setCookie (name,value,days) {if (days){var date = new Date();date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));var expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();}else var expires = "";document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";}function getCookie (name) {var nameEQ = name + "=";var ca = document.cookie.split(';');for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++){var c = ca[i];while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);}return null;}function increaseFontSize(e) {e.preventDefault();$(this).css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".defaultSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});var temp=document.getElementById('inc').innerHTMLvar p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {if(p[i].style.fontSize) {var s = parseInt(p[i].style.fontSize.replace("px",""));} else {var s = 18;}if(s!=max) {s = 18;}if(p[i].style.lineHeight) {var t = parseInt(p[i].style.lineHeight.replace("px","")); } else {var t = 24; }if(t!=max1) {t = 24; } p[i].style.fontSize = s+"px"p[i].style.lineHeight = t+"px"} // save the font size in a cookie for one daysetCookie('fontsize', s, 1);setCookie('lineheight', t, 1);}function decreaseFontSize(e) {e.preventDefault();var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');	$(this).css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".largeSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});	for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {if(p[i].style.fontSize) {var s = parseInt(p[i].style.fontSize.replace("px",""));} else {var s = 14;}if(s!=min) {s =14;}if(p[i].style.lineHeight) {var t = parseInt(p[i].style.lineHeight.replace("px","")); } else {var t = 18; }if(t!=min1) {t = 18; } p[i].style.lineHeight = t+"px"p[i].style.fontSize = s+"px"} // save the font size in a cookie for one daysetCookie('fontsize', s, 1);setCookie('lineheight', t, 1);}$(document).ready(function() {// if the cookie exists, restore the variablevar fontsize = getCookie('fontsize');var lineheight = getCookie('lineheight'); if (fontsize) {var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {document.getElementsByTagName('p')[i].style.fontSize = fontsize + 'px' ; }if(fontsize > 16){$(".largeSize").css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".defaultSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});}}if (lineheight) {var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {document.getElementsByTagName('p')[i].style.lineHeight = lineheight + 'px' }}$(".defaultSize").click(decreaseFontSize);$(".largeSize").click(increaseFontSize);});</script><NOSCRIPT><a href="http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-national/tp-andhrapradesh/75-pc-added-tax-for-constructing-buildings-on-freshlylaid-roads/article1566826.ece?textsize=large&test=1" title="Large Text Size" >T+</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;·&nbsp;&nbsp; }}</script> <div id="topShare"><div id="addsharetop"><div class="fshare"><div class="fb-like" data-href="http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-national/tp-andhrapradesh/75-pc-added-tax-for-constructing-buildings-on-freshlylaid-roads/article1566826.ece" data-send="true" data-layout="button_count" data-show-faces="true" data-font="arial"> </div></div><div class="twit">	<a href="https://twitter.com/share" class="twitter-share-button" data-url="http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-national/tp-andhrapradesh/article1566826.ece" data-count="horizontal">Tweet</a></div><div class="gplus">	<g:plusone size="medium"></g:plusone></div><div class="inShare floatLeft"><script src="//platform.linkedin.com/in.js" type="text/javascript"> lang: en_US</script><script type="IN/Share" data-url="http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-national/tp-andhrapradesh/75-pc-added-tax-for-constructing-buildings-on-freshlylaid-roads/article1566826.ece" data-counter="right"></script></div><div class="twit1"><script type="text/javascript">var addthis_config = {"data_track_clickback":true, ui_click: true,services_compact: 'email, favorites, gmail, hotmail, blogger, instapaper, wordpress, more',services_exclude: 'facebook,twitter',data_ga_property: 'UA-10158580-1',data_ga_social: true}</script><a href="http://addthis.com/bookmark.php?v=250&amp;username=thehindu" class="addthis_counter addthis_pill_style" title="Share via more services"></a></div>	</div>	<div class="line2"></div></div><div class="article-text"><div class="articleLead"></div><p class="body">GHMC has decided to levy a value addition tax of 7.5 per cent a year on all new building permissions to be sought on either side of any freshly-laid roads to be taken up. This will be in addition to the usual building permit and other fees collected when applications are made for taking building plans approval.</p><p class="body">However, it will not be applicable for buildings coming up on 200 sq. mts plots. </p><p class="body">Owners of vacant plots on either side of the new link road being constructed at the IDL-Kukatpally junction will be the first to shell out such a fee. </p><p class="body">The proposal has been cleared by the Standing Committee and is to be applicable wherever fresh roads are to be laid. </p><p class="body">Plot owners desirous of taking building permissions to take advantage of the road accessibility because of the increased values will therefore have to &#8216;share the income' with the Municipal Corporation. Such a tax was begun by the now defunct Cyberabad Urban Development Authority.</p><p class="body">The committee, while refusing to hand over municipal lands for constructing government schools at three different locations, allowed the sale of 1,500 sq.yards to CPDCL for building a substation at Shamshiguda village, Balanagar mandal (Kukatpally). </p><p class="body">Members were more keen on constructing commercial complexes at vacant plots at Amberpet (494.46 sq.mts) and Himayatnagar (3,019 sq.yards) rather than &#8216;hand over' for schools. </p><p class="body">They also demanded a land to land compensation from the revenue department.</p><p class="body"/><p class="body"><i><b><hr/><li>Proposal cleared by Standing Committee, applicable wherever fresh roads are laid</li><li>Similar tax was initially launched by now-defunct Cyberabad Urban Development Authority</li></b></i></p><hr/><script type="text/javascript">$(function() {$('#articleKeywords a').click( function() { var keyword = $(this).text();if (keyword.indexOf(' ') != -1)$('input#searchString').attr("value", '"' + keyword + '"');else$('input#searchString').attr("value", keyword);$('#simpleSearchForm').submit();return false;});});</script><div id="articleKeywords"><p></p></div><div class="noline"></div><div class="amzn" style="margin-bottom:15px; class="breadcr"><h3 class="artbcrumb"> <div class="todayslink">&raquo; Today&#039;s Paper&raquo; METRO PLUS</div></h3></span><span class="dateline"><span class="upper"></span>March 24, 2011</span></div><div class="line zero15"></div><h1 class="detail-title">Shopping @ M G Road</h1><script type="text/javascript"><!--// These variables are for maintaining state when using ad skipvar google_num_ads = 0;var google_last_ad_type = '';function google_ad_request_done(google_ads) {/** This function is required and is used to display* the ads that are returned from the JavaScript* request. You should modify the document.write* commands so that the HTML they write out fits* with your desired ad layout.*/var s;/** Verify that there are actually ads to display.*/if (google_ads.length == 0)return;google_num_ads += google_ads.length;google_last_ad_type = google_ads[0].type;/** If an image or Flash ad is returned, display that ad.* If a rich media ad is returned, display that as "as is."* Otherwise, build a string containing all of the ads and* then use a document.write() command to print that string.*/s = '<div id="google-ad-border">';if (google_ads[0].type == "image") {s += '<a href="' + google_ads[0].url +'" target="_top" title="go to ' + google_ads[0].visible_url +'"><img border="0" src="' + google_ads[0].image_url +'"width="' + google_ads[0].image_width +'"height="' + google_ads[0].image_height + '"></a>';}else if (google_ads[0].type == "flash") {s += '<object classid="clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000"' +' codebase="http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,0,0"' +' WIDTH="' + google_ad.image_width +'" HEIGHT="' + google_ad.image_height + '">' +'<PARAM NAME="movie" VALUE="' + google_ad.image_url + '">' +'<PARAM NAME="quality" VALUE="high">' +'<PARAM NAME="AllowScriptAccess" VALUE="never">' +'<EMBED src="' + google_ad.image_url +'" WIDTH="' + google_ad.image_width +'" HEIGHT="' + google_ad.image_height +'" TYPE="application/x-shockwave-flash"' +' AllowScriptAccess="never" ' +' PLUGINSPAGE="http://www.macromedia.com/go/getflashplayer"></EMBED></OBJECT>';}else if (google_ads[0].type == "html") {s += google_ads[0].snippet;}else if (google_ads[0].type == "text") {// Adjust text sizes to occupy the majority of ad space.if (google_ads.length == 1) {ad_title_class = 'ad_title_small';ad_text_class = 'ad_text_small';ad_url_class = 'ad_url_small';} else {ad_title_class = 'ad_title';ad_text_class = 'ad_text';ad_url_class = 'ad_url';}for(var i=0; i < google_ads.length; i++) {s += '<div class="ad_no_background"><a class="' + ad_title_class + '" href="' + google_ads[i].url + '" target="_blank">' +google_ads[i].line1 + '</a> - <span class="' + ad_text_class + '">' +google_ads[i].line2 + ' ' +google_ads[i].line3 + '</span> ' +'<a class="' + ad_url_class + '" href="' + google_ads[i].url + '" target="_blank" >' +google_ads[i].visible_url + '</a></div><div class="ad_label"><a class="ad_attrheadbelow" href="'+google_info.feedback_url+'" target="_blank">Ads by Google</a></div></div>';}}document.write(s);return;}// --></script><script type="text/javascript"><!--/** This section is responsible for setting the parameters of the ad call* Customize this section to your needs with input from your account manager*/// The following parameters should be modified appropriatelygoogle_ad_client = 'ca-hindu_site_html'; // type of ads to display - text,image,flash,htmlgoogle_safe = 'high'; // specify the ad safetygoogle_feedback = 'on';// The following parameter is required if you are displaying image, Flash or rich media ads.google_image_size = '468x60'; // the size of the ad block// The following parameters are options you can specify as necessary// google_encoding = 'utf8'; // specify the output language of the ads// google_language = 'en'; // override the default page language// The following parameter should be used only during testing// google_adtest = 'on'; // remove this line on launch day// --></script><!--/** The JavaScript returned from the following page uses* the parameter values assigned above to populate an array* of ad objects. Once that array has been populated,* the JavaScript will call the google_ad_request_done* function to display the ads.*/--><script type="text/javascript" src="http://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/show_ads.js"></script><script type="text/javascript">var addthis_pub = "thehindu";</script><div class="detail-info"><div class="article-links"><a href="?css=print" title="Print">print</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;·&nbsp;&nbsp; <a href="" style="color:#aeaeae;" title="Change Text Size" id="inc" class="defaultSize">T</a>&nbsp;<a href="" style="font-size:18px;" title="Change Text Size" id="inc" class="largeSize">T</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;<script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">var min=8;var max=18;var min1=18;var max1=24; /* set cookie functions */function setCookie (name,value,days) {if (days){var date = new Date();date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));var expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();}else var expires = "";document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";}function getCookie (name) {var nameEQ = name + "=";var ca = document.cookie.split(';');for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++){var c = ca[i];while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);}return null;}function increaseFontSize(e) {e.preventDefault();$(this).css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".defaultSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});var temp=document.getElementById('inc').innerHTMLvar p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {if(p[i].style.fontSize) {var s = parseInt(p[i].style.fontSize.replace("px",""));} else {var s = 18;}if(s!=max) {s = 18;}if(p[i].style.lineHeight) {var t = parseInt(p[i].style.lineHeight.replace("px","")); } else {var t = 24; }if(t!=max1) {t = 24; } p[i].style.fontSize = s+"px"p[i].style.lineHeight = t+"px"} // save the font size in a cookie for one daysetCookie('fontsize', s, 1);setCookie('lineheight', t, 1);}function decreaseFontSize(e) {e.preventDefault();var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');	$(this).css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".largeSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});	for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {if(p[i].style.fontSize) {var s = parseInt(p[i].style.fontSize.replace("px",""));} else {var s = 14;}if(s!=min) {s =14;}if(p[i].style.lineHeight) {var t = parseInt(p[i].style.lineHeight.replace("px","")); } else {var t = 18; }if(t!=min1) {t = 18; } p[i].style.lineHeight = t+"px"p[i].style.fontSize = s+"px"} // save the font size in a cookie for one daysetCookie('fontsize', s, 1);setCookie('lineheight', t, 1);}$(document).ready(function() {// if the cookie exists, restore the variablevar fontsize = getCookie('fontsize');var lineheight = getCookie('lineheight'); if (fontsize) {var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {document.getElementsByTagName('p')[i].style.fontSize = fontsize + 'px' ; }if(fontsize > 16){$(".largeSize").css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".defaultSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});}}if (lineheight) {var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {document.getElementsByTagName('p')[i].style.lineHeight = lineheight + 'px' }}$(".defaultSize").click(decreaseFontSize);$(".largeSize").click(increaseFontSize);});</script><NOSCRIPT><a href="http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-features/tp-metroplus/shopping-m-g-road/article1566173.ece?textsize=large&test=1" title="Large Text Size" >T+</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;·&nbsp;&nbsp; }}</script> <div id="topShare"><div id="addsharetop"><div class="fshare"><div class="fb-like" data-href="http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-features/tp-metroplus/shopping-m-g-road/article1566173.ece" data-send="true" data-layout="button_count" data-show-faces="true" data-font="arial"> </div></div><div class="twit">	<a href="https://twitter.com/share" class="twitter-share-button" data-url="http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-features/tp-metroplus/article1566173.ece" data-count="horizontal">Tweet</a></div><div class="gplus">	<g:plusone size="medium"></g:plusone></div><div class="inShare floatLeft"><script src="//platform.linkedin.com/in.js" type="text/javascript"> lang: en_US</script><script type="IN/Share" data-url="http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-features/tp-metroplus/shopping-m-g-road/article1566173.ece" data-counter="right"></script></div><div class="twit1"><script type="text/javascript">var addthis_config = {"data_track_clickback":true, ui_click: true,services_compact: 'email, favorites, gmail, hotmail, blogger, instapaper, wordpress, more',services_exclude: 'facebook,twitter',data_ga_property: 'UA-10158580-1',data_ga_social: true}</script><a href="http://addthis.com/bookmark.php?v=250&amp;username=thehindu" class="addthis_counter addthis_pill_style" title="Share via more services"></a></div>	</div>	<div class="line2"></div></div><div class="article-text"><div class="articleLead"></div><p class="body">M G Road or Mahatma Gandhi Road in Kochi has long been acknowledged as the &#8216;lifestyle hub' of Kochi. From the huge textile shops that showcase the latest trends in fashion, the large jewellery outlets, home appliances shops, retail stores, hospitals, banks, major hotels, theatres to some of the main industrial establishments in the state are located here. The road lies north-south with its boundaries at the Venduruthy bridge, Thevara and the Madhava Pharmacy Junction, where it intersects the Banerji Road. &#8220;M G Road is perhaps the greatest shopping destination in Kerala, where every variety of shop is available for the customer, regardless of the budget. The top brands from the world are available here and at the same time, the prices are indeed cheaper when compared to shopping in the malls. It is perhaps the most popular destination for high end retail purchase in the state. It is located in a vast area which makes shopping at M G Road, a great experience. With bus stands and railway stations located quite near, it is easy for anyone to reach here,&#8221; says Ramesh Pai of A.Geeripai Jewellers at M G Road. With the changing concepts of fashion, M G Road has remained a trendy place to shop. It has for long been a popular choice for shopping and continues to be getting more beautiful, day by day. The variety of shops available in M G Road makes it a great fashion hub.</p><p class="body"><i>Compiled by Vijay</i></p><script type="text/javascript">$(function() {$('#articleKeywords a').click( function() { var keyword = $(this).text();if (keyword.indexOf(' ') != -1)$('input#searchString').attr("value", '"' + keyword + '"');else$('input#searchString').attr("value", keyword);$('#simpleSearchForm').submit();return false;});});</script><div id="articleKeywords"><p></p></div><div class="noline"></div><div class="amzn" style="margin-bottom:15px; class="breadcr"><h3 class="artbcrumb"> <div class="todayslink">&raquo; Today&#039;s Paper&raquo; METRO PLUS</div></h3></span><span class="dateline"><span class="upper"></span>March 24, 2011</span></div><div class="line zero15"></div><h1 class="detail-title">Music on Khajoor Road</h1><script type="text/javascript"><!--// These variables are for maintaining state when using ad skipvar google_num_ads = 0;var google_last_ad_type = '';function google_ad_request_done(google_ads) {/** This function is required and is used to display* the ads that are returned from the JavaScript* request. You should modify the document.write* commands so that the HTML they write out fits* with your desired ad layout.*/var s;/** Verify that there are actually ads to display.*/if (google_ads.length == 0)return;google_num_ads += google_ads.length;google_last_ad_type = google_ads[0].type;/** If an image or Flash ad is returned, display that ad.* If a rich media ad is returned, display that as "as is."* Otherwise, build a string containing all of the ads and* then use a document.write() command to print that string.*/s = '<div id="google-ad-border">';if (google_ads[0].type == "image") {s += '<a href="' + google_ads[0].url +'" target="_top" title="go to ' + google_ads[0].visible_url +'"><img border="0" src="' + google_ads[0].image_url +'"width="' + google_ads[0].image_width +'"height="' + google_ads[0].image_height + '"></a>';}else if (google_ads[0].type == "flash") {s += '<object classid="clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000"' +' codebase="http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,0,0"' +' WIDTH="' + google_ad.image_width +'" HEIGHT="' + google_ad.image_height + '">' +'<PARAM NAME="movie" VALUE="' + google_ad.image_url + '">' +'<PARAM NAME="quality" VALUE="high">' +'<PARAM NAME="AllowScriptAccess" VALUE="never">' +'<EMBED src="' + google_ad.image_url +'" WIDTH="' + google_ad.image_width +'" HEIGHT="' + google_ad.image_height +'" TYPE="application/x-shockwave-flash"' +' AllowScriptAccess="never" ' +' PLUGINSPAGE="http://www.macromedia.com/go/getflashplayer"></EMBED></OBJECT>';}else if (google_ads[0].type == "html") {s += google_ads[0].snippet;}else if (google_ads[0].type == "text") {// Adjust text sizes to occupy the majority of ad space.if (google_ads.length == 1) {ad_title_class = 'ad_title_small';ad_text_class = 'ad_text_small';ad_url_class = 'ad_url_small';} else {ad_title_class = 'ad_title';ad_text_class = 'ad_text';ad_url_class = 'ad_url';}for(var i=0; i < google_ads.length; i++) {s += '<div class="ad_no_background"><a class="' + ad_title_class + '" href="' + google_ads[i].url + '" target="_blank">' +google_ads[i].line1 + '</a> - <span class="' + ad_text_class + '">' +google_ads[i].line2 + ' ' +google_ads[i].line3 + '</span> ' +'<a class="' + ad_url_class + '" href="' + google_ads[i].url + '" target="_blank" >' +google_ads[i].visible_url + '</a></div><div class="ad_label"><a class="ad_attrheadbelow" href="'+google_info.feedback_url+'" target="_blank">Ads by Google</a></div></div>';}}document.write(s);return;}// --></script><script type="text/javascript"><!--/** This section is responsible for setting the parameters of the ad call* Customize this section to your needs with input from your account manager*/// The following parameters should be modified appropriatelygoogle_ad_client = 'ca-hindu_site_html'; // substitute your client_idgoogle_ad_channel = '6568152145'; // substitute your channelgoogle_ad_output = 'js'; // leave this value as jsgoogle_max_num_ads = '1'; // specify the number of maximum adsgoogle_ad_type = 'text'; // type of ads to display - text,image,flash,htmlgoogle_safe = 'high'; // specify the ad safetygoogle_feedback = 'on';// The following parameter is required if you are displaying image, Flash or rich media ads.google_image_size = '468x60'; // the size of the ad block// The following parameters are options you can specify as necessary// google_encoding = 'utf8'; // specify the output language of the ads// google_language = 'en'; // override the default page language// The following parameter should be used only during testing// google_adtest = 'on'; // remove this line on launch day// --></script><!--/** The JavaScript returned from the following page uses* the parameter values assigned above to populate an array* of ad objects. Once that array has been populated,* the JavaScript will call the google_ad_request_done* function to display the ads.*/--><script type="text/javascript" src="http://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/show_ads.js"></script><script type="text/javascript">var addthis_pub = "thehindu";</script><span class="artauthor"><ul><li><a href="http://www.thehindu.com/profile/author/angshuk-bhowmik/" >ANGSHUK BHOWMIK</a></li> </ul></span>	<div class="detail-info"><div class="article-links"><a href="?css=print" title="Print">print</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;·&nbsp;&nbsp; <a href="" style="color:#aeaeae;" title="Change Text Size" id="inc" class="defaultSize">T</a>&nbsp;<a href="" style="font-size:18px;" title="Change Text Size" id="inc" class="largeSize">T</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;<script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">var min=8;var max=18;var min1=18;var max1=24; /* set cookie functions */function setCookie (name,value,days) {if (days){var date = new Date();date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));var expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();}else var expires = "";document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";}function getCookie (name) {var nameEQ = name + "=";var ca = document.cookie.split(';');for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++){var c = ca[i];while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);}return null;}function increaseFontSize(e) {e.preventDefault();$(this).css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".defaultSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});var temp=document.getElementById('inc').innerHTMLvar p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {if(p[i].style.fontSize) {var s = parseInt(p[i].style.fontSize.replace("px",""));} else {var s = 18;}if(s!=max) {s = 18;}if(p[i].style.lineHeight) {var t = parseInt(p[i].style.lineHeight.replace("px","")); } else {var t = 24; }if(t!=max1) {t = 24; } p[i].style.fontSize = s+"px"p[i].style.lineHeight = t+"px"} // save the font size in a cookie for one daysetCookie('fontsize', s, 1);setCookie('lineheight', t, 1);}function decreaseFontSize(e) {e.preventDefault();var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');	$(this).css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".largeSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});	for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {if(p[i].style.fontSize) {var s = parseInt(p[i].style.fontSize.replace("px",""));} else {var s = 14;}if(s!=min) {s =14;}if(p[i].style.lineHeight) {var t = parseInt(p[i].style.lineHeight.replace("px","")); } else {var t = 18; }if(t!=min1) {t = 18; } p[i].style.lineHeight = t+"px"p[i].style.fontSize = s+"px"} // save the font size in a cookie for one daysetCookie('fontsize', s, 1);setCookie('lineheight', t, 1);}$(document).ready(function() {// if the cookie exists, restore the variablevar fontsize = getCookie('fontsize');var lineheight = getCookie('lineheight'); if (fontsize) {var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {document.getElementsByTagName('p')[i].style.fontSize = fontsize + 'px' ; }if(fontsize > 16){$(".largeSize").css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".defaultSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});}}if (lineheight) {var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {document.getElementsByTagName('p')[i].style.lineHeight = lineheight + 'px' }}$(".defaultSize").click(decreaseFontSize);$(".largeSize").click(increaseFontSize);});</script><NOSCRIPT><a href="http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-features/tp-metroplus/music-on-khajoor-road/article1566217.ece?textsize=large&test=1" title="Large Text Size" >T+</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;·&nbsp;&nbsp; <a type="text/javascript">function toggle() {var ele = document.getElementById("topShare");var text = document.getElementById("click");if(ele.style.display == "block") {ele.style.display = "none";text.innerHTML = "Share";}else {ele.style.display = "block";text.innerHTML = "Share"; }}</script> <div id="topShare"><div id="addsharetop"><div class="fshare"><div class="fb-like" lang: en_US</script><script type="IN/Share" data-url="http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-features/tp-metroplus/music-on-khajoor-road/article1566217.ece" data-counter="right"></script></div><div class="pin"><a href="http://pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-features/tp-metroplus/music-on-khajoor-road/article1566217.ece&media=http://www.thehindu.com/multimedia/dynamic/00507/hy21indianocean-cha_507768g.jpg&description=Music on Khajoor Road" class="pin-it-button" count-layout="horizontal"><img border="0" src="//assets.pinterest.com/images/PinExt.png" title="Pin It" /></a></div><div class="twit1"><script type="text/javascript">var addthis_config = {"data_track_clickback":true, ui_click: true,services_compact: 'email, favorites, gmail, hotmail, blogger, instapaper, wordpress, more',services_exclude: 'facebook,twitter',data_ga_property: 'UA-10158580-1',data_ga_social: true}</script><a href="http://addthis.com/bookmark.php?v=250&amp;username=thehindu" class="addthis_counter addthis_pill_style" title="Share via more services"></a></div>	</div>	<div class="line2"></div></div><div class="article-text"><div class="articleLead"><h2>Chat Indian Ocean on their journey so far and the road yet to be covered</h2></div><div class="text-embed"><img src="http://www.thehindu.com/multimedia/dynamic/00507/hy21indianocean-cha_507768e.jpg" class="main-image" alt="Love for music The Indian Ocean band PHOTO:M. SUBHASH" width="318" height="164" title="Love for music The Indian Ocean band PHOTO:M. SUBHASH"/><div class="photo-caption"><div class="photo-source"></div>Love for music The Indian Ocean band PHOTO:M. SUBHASH</div></div><div class="article-body"><p class="body">H<i>yderabad has always extended an overwhelming welcome to Indian Ocean. Here in the city to promote their forthcoming album 16/330, Khajoor Road, the artistes took time off to share the experiences of their journey, their new album and life without Asheem Chakravarty. Excerpts from an interview:</i></p><p class="body"><b>Indian Ocean has worked with various musical influences. But in the context of Indian alternative music space, how would you define the sound of Indian Ocean?</b></p><p class="body">When we started playing music in the late 80s, bands were mostly playing covers of American or British rock bands. </p><p class="body">There was not much happening in the alternative music scene except albums cut by the band <i>Ananda Shankar and His Music,</i> featuring sitar player Ananda Shankar, with the famous song <i>Streets of Calcutta</i>, and <i>Divya</i>, which released the cult album <i>Madras Cafe</i> in the late 1980s. The original alternative music space was almost vacant when we stepped in. We could not play fusion music since none of us were classically trained. Indian Ocean's distinctive musical style came up from Sushmit's unique guitar playing and Asheem's tabla to support him. Sushmit, with his deep influence of Hindustani classical, started emulating the &#8216;Indian' sound on his guitar and that created a huge difference. Indian Ocean has seldom played conventional riffs, trying more to experiment with the melody and the beats, deftly balancing the tabla and the drums and the music has sprung from the experimentation to explore the possibilities of individual musicians.</p><p class="body"><b> How is 16/330 Khajoor Road different from your previous albums?</b></p><p class="body"><i>16/330 Khajoor Road</i> is different in quite a few respects. Most of the songs featured in this album were composed for some film or the other, but were not used. Like the songs <i>Chand</i> and <i>Shunya</i> were composed for films by the same names. '</p><p class="body">The song <i>Zindagi se darte ho </i>featured in the Anusha Rizvi film <i>Peepli Live. </i>This is the first Indian Ocean album featuring film tracks. These were the last songs that Asheem composed with Indian Ocean. So, this is the last album of Indian Ocean which will feature Asheem. Therefore, this album is special. We also worked with Bangladeshi vocalist Anusheh Anadil on a Bengali song titled <i>Bondhu</i>.<i/> We are allowing our fans to download one song every month till this month. We will release the CD of the album and a few other practice tracks after that.</p><p class="body"><b>Indian Ocean has composed background scores and songs for films. How is it different from working on an album?</b></p><p class="body">The two things are completely different. We do not consciously work on albums. We play music, and we compose songs, most of which come up from our jam sessions. Once we have a few songs, we think of an album. However, working on a film is different. When one is working for some particular project, there would be a few creative restraints. However, Indian Ocean has been lucky to work with people who have given them ample space to do their own work and the band is quite happy with the kind of work they have done so far. Working on one's own songs are quite different because then there is the scope of experimenting a lot and doing new things.</p><p class="body"><b>. What kind of musical collaboration does Indian Ocean plan to come up with in the future?</b></p><p class="body">Indian Ocean has been collaborating with musicians for a long time. We have played live on stage with artistes like Shubha Mudgal, Rabbi Shergill and the likes and have also formed alliances with other musicians for our film projects. </p><p class="body">This is the first time we are thinking of coming up with a collaborative album, probably with an Indian or an international artiste, but this was in the pipeline. </p><p class="body">We have not decided on whom to collaborate with but we are looking forward to doing some good music.</p><p class="body"><b>How</b> <b>has the sound of Indian Ocean changed or will change in the future in the post-Asheem era?</b></p><p class="body">Asheem was the backbone of Indian Ocean and it is hard to compensate his loss. But we have Tuheen playing the tabla and Himanshu on the vocals to fill in Asheem's place. We are currently playing songs which were composed with Asheem. Whether the sound will change can only or how it will change can only be gauged in the future.</p><p class="body">ANGSHUK BHOWMIK</p><script type="text/javascript">$(function() {$('#articleKeywords a').click( function() { var keyword = $(this).text();if (keyword.indexOf(' ') != -1)$('input#searchString').attr("value", '"' + keyword + '"');else$('input#searchString').attr("value", keyword);$('#simpleSearchForm').submit();return false;});});</script><div id="articleKeywords"><p></p></div><div class="clear"> </div><div class="noline"></div><div class="amzn" style="margin-bottom:15px; width:100%;"><center><!-- Javascript tag: --><!-- begin ZEDO for channel: Hindu_Text_640x55 , publisher: Hindu , Ad Dimension: 640x55 - 640 x 55 --><script language="JavaScript">var zflag_nid="2132"; var zflag_cid="552"; var zflag_sid="1"; var zflag_width="640"; var zflag_height="55"; var zflag_sz="86"; </script><script language="JavaScript" class="count1566217 c_p3"></span></div><div class="noline"></div> <div id="keywordline"> </div><div class="rel-block-sec">More In: <a <a href="" style="color:#aeaeae;" title="Change Text Size" id="inc" class="defaultSize">T</a>&nbsp;<a href="" style="font-size:18px;" title="Change Text Size" id="inc" class="largeSize">T</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;<script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">var min=8;var max=18;var min1=18;var max1=24; /* set cookie functions */function setCookie (name,value,days) {if (days){var date = new Date();date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));var expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();}else var expires = "";document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";}function getCookie (name) {var nameEQ = name + "=";var ca = document.cookie.split(';');for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++){var c = ca[i];while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);}return null;}function increaseFontSize(e) {e.preventDefault();$(this).css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".defaultSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});var temp=document.getElementById('inc').innerHTMLvar p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {if(p[i].style.fontSize) {var s = parseInt(p[i].style.fontSize.replace("px",""));} else {var s = 18;}if(s!=max) {s = 18;}if(p[i].style.lineHeight) {var t = parseInt(p[i].style.lineHeight.replace("px","")); } else {var t = 24; }if(t!=max1) {t = 24; } p[i].style.fontSize = s+"px"p[i].style.lineHeight = t+"px"} // save the font size in a cookie for one daysetCookie('fontsize', s, 1);setCookie('lineheight', t, 1);}function decreaseFontSize(e) {e.preventDefault();var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');	$(this).css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".largeSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});	for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {if(p[i].style.fontSize) {var s = parseInt(p[i].style.fontSize.replace("px",""));} else {var s = 14;}if(s!=min) {s =14;}if(p[i].style.lineHeight) {var t = parseInt(p[i].style.lineHeight.replace("px","")); } else {var t = 18; }if(t!=min1) {t = 18; } p[i].style.lineHeight = t+"px"p[i].style.fontSize = s+"px"} // save the font size in a cookie for one daysetCookie('fontsize', s, 1);setCookie('lineheight', t, 1);}$(document).ready(function() {// if the cookie exists, restore the variablevar fontsize = getCookie('fontsize');var lineheight = getCookie('lineheight'); if (fontsize) {var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {document.getElementsByTagName('p')[i].style.fontSize = fontsize + 'px' ; }if(fontsize > 16){$(".largeSize").css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".defaultSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});}}if (lineheight) {var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {document.getElementsByTagName('p')[i].style.lineHeight = lineheight + 'px' }}$(".defaultSize").click(decreaseFontSize);$(".largeSize").click(increaseFontSize);});</script><NOSCRIPT><a href="http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/ten-persons-killed-in-three-road-accidents/article1569609.ece?textsize=large&test=1" title="Large Text Size" >T+</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;·&nbsp;&nbsp;
