}}</script> <div id="topShare"><div id="addsharetop"><div class="fshare"><div class="fb-like" data-href="http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/ten-persons-killed-in-three-road-accidents/article1569609.ece" data-send="true" data-layout="button_count" data-show-faces="true" data-font="arial"> </div></div><div class="twit">	<a href="https://twitter.com/share" class="twitter-share-button" data-url="http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/article1569609.ece" data-count="horizontal">Tweet</a></div><div class="gplus">	<g:plusone size="medium"></g:plusone></div><div class="inShare floatLeft"><script src="//platform.linkedin.com/in.js" type="text/javascript"> lang: en_US</script><script type="IN/Share" data-url="http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/ten-persons-killed-in-three-road-accidents/article1569609.ece" data-counter="right"></script></div><div class="twit1"><script type="text/javascript">var addthis_config = {"data_track_clickback":true, ui_click: true,services_compact: 'email, favorites, gmail, hotmail, blogger, instapaper, wordpress, more',services_exclude: 'facebook,twitter',data_ga_property: 'UA-10158580-1',data_ga_social: true}</script><a href="http://addthis.com/bookmark.php?v=250&amp;username=thehindu" class="addthis_counter addthis_pill_style" title="Share via more services"></a></div>	</div>	<div class="line2"></div></div><div class="article-text"><div class="articleLead"><h2>Five of a family travelling in an autorickshaw and driver among those killed</h2></div><p class="body">Ten persons were killed in three road accidents in and around the city on Thursday and Wednesday.</p><p class="body">Five persons of a family travelling in an autorickshaw and its driver were killed when it collided against a lorry on Shankarpally-Chevella road on city outskirts on Thursday evening. Three more persons travelling in the three-wheeler were injured. One of them was rushed to Osmania General Hospital, the Ranga Reddy SP, Muni Swamy, said.</p><p class="body">The victims hailed from Chinnamangalaram village of Moinabad and were going to Kondapur in Medak in two autorickshaws to attend a family function. They were identified as N. Venkataiah, 60, N. Mallesh, 40, his wife, Kantamma, 40, N. Kishtaiah, 39, B. Anthamma, and the driver, V. Venkatesh, 30.</p><p class="body">In a separate incident, three persons were killed after the motorcycle they were travelling on was hit by a speeding van at Kushaiguda on Wednesday midnight. The victims, Bhulebhai (50), Rajan (40), and Junnu (36), were natives of Warangal district. </p><p class="body">They were returning home at Kushaiguda after meeting their relatives.</p><p class="body">In yet another incident, a second-year MSc student was crushed to death under the wheels of an APSRTC bus at Uppuguda in Chatrinaka on Thursday. The victim, Sara Sultana (21) of Kandikal Gate, was crossing the road when the bus hit her leading to grievous injuries. Death was instant for the girl, police said.</p><script type="text/javascript">$(function() {$('#articleKeywords a').click( function() { var keyword = $(this).text();if (keyword.indexOf(' ') != -1)$('input#searchString').attr("value", '"' + keyword + '"');else$('input#searchString').attr("value", keyword);$('#simpleSearchForm').submit();return false;});});</script><div skipvar google_num_ads = 0;var google_last_ad_type = '';function google_ad_request_done(google_ads) {/** This function is required and is used to display* the ads that are returned from the 0)return;google_num_ads += google_ads.length;google_last_ad_type = google_ads[0].type;/** If an image or Flash ad is returned, display that ad.* If a rich media ad is returned, display that as "as is."* Otherwise, build a string containing all of the ads and* then use a document.write() command to print that string.*/s = '<div class="ad_below_label"><a class="ad_below_attribution" href="'+google_info.feedback_url+'">Ads by Google</a></div>';if (google_ads[0].type == "image") {s += '<a href="' + google_ads[0].url +'" target="_top" title="go to ' + google_ads[0].visible_url +'"><img border="0" src="' + google_ads[0].image_url +'"width="' + google_ads[0].image_width +'"height="' + google_ads[0].image_height + '"></a>';}else if (google_ads[0].type == "flash") {s += '<object classid="clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000"' +' codebase="http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,0,0"' +' WIDTH="' + google_ad.image_width +'" HEIGHT="' + google_ad.image_height + '">' +'<PARAM NAME="movie" VALUE="' + google_ad.image_url + '">' +'<PARAM NAME="quality" VALUE="high">' +'<PARAM NAME="AllowScriptAccess" VALUE="never">' +'<EMBED src="' + google_ad.image_url +'" WIDTH="' + google_ad.image_width +'" HEIGHT="' + google_ad.image_height +'" TYPE="application/x-shockwave-flash"' +' AllowScriptAccess="never" ' +' PLUGINSPAGE="http://www.macromedia.com/go/getflashplayer"></EMBED></OBJECT>';}else if (google_ads[0].type == "html") {s += google_ads[0].snippet;}else if (google_ads[0].type == "text") {// Adjust text sizes to occupy the majority of ad space.if (google_ads.length == 1) {ad_title_class = 'ad_below_title_large';ad_text_class = 'ad_below_text_large';ad_url_class = 'ad_below_url_large';} else {ad_title_class = 'ad_below_title';ad_text_class = 'ad_below_text';ad_url_class = 'ad_below_url';}for(var i=0; i < google_ads.length; i++) {s += '<div class="ad_below_background"><a class="' + ad_title_class + '" href="' + google_ads[i].url + '" >' +google_ads[i].line1 + '</a><br><span class="' + ad_text_class + '">' +google_ads[i].line2 + ' ' +google_ads[i].line3 + '</span><br>' +'<a class="' + ad_url_class + '" href="' + google_ads[i].url + '" >' +google_ads[i].visible_url + '</a><br></div>';}}document.write(s);return;}// --></script><script type="text/javascript"><!--/** This section is responsible for setting the parameters of the ad call* Customize this section to your needs with input from your account manager*/// The following parameters should be modified class="breadcr"><h3 class="artbcrumb"> <div class="todayslink">&raquo; Today&#039;s Paper&raquo; KARNATAKA</div></h3></span><span class="dateline"><span class="upper">BANGALORE,</span>March 25, 2011</span></div><div class="line zero15"></div><h1 class="detail-title">Road transport corporations to enhance allowance for trainees</h1><script type="text/javascript"><!--// These variables are for maintaining state when using ad skipvar google_num_ads = 0;var google_last_ad_type = '';function google_ad_request_done(google_ads) {/** This function is required and is used to display* the ads that are returned from the JavaScript* request. You should modify the document.write* commands so that the HTML they write out fits* with your desired ad layout.*/var s;/** Verify that there are actually ads to display.*/if (google_ads.length == 0)return;google_num_ads += google_ads.length;google_last_ad_type = google_ads[0].type;/** If an image or Flash ad is returned, display that ad.* If a rich media ad is returned, display that as "as is."* Otherwise, build a string containing all of the ads and* then use a document.write() command to print that string.*/s = '<div id="google-ad-border">';if (google_ads[0].type == "image") {s += '<a href="' + google_ads[0].url +'" target="_top" title="go to ' + google_ads[0].visible_url +'"><img border="0" src="' + google_ads[0].image_url +'"width="' + google_ads[0].image_width +'"height="' + google_ads[0].image_height + '"></a>';}else if (google_ads[0].type == "flash") {s += '<object classid="clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000"' +' codebase="http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,0,0"' +' WIDTH="' + google_ad.image_width +'" HEIGHT="' + google_ad.image_height + '">' +'<PARAM NAME="movie" VALUE="' + google_ad.image_url + '">' +'<PARAM NAME="quality" VALUE="high">' +'<PARAM NAME="AllowScriptAccess" VALUE="never">' +'<EMBED src="' + google_ad.image_url +'" WIDTH="' + google_ad.image_width +'" HEIGHT="' + google_ad.image_height +'" TYPE="application/x-shockwave-flash"' +' AllowScriptAccess="never" ' +' PLUGINSPAGE="http://www.macromedia.com/go/getflashplayer"></EMBED></OBJECT>';}else if (google_ads[0].type == "html") {s += google_ads[0].snippet;}else if (google_ads[0].type == "text") {// Adjust text sizes to occupy the majority of ad space.if (google_ads.length == 1) {ad_title_class = 'ad_title_small';ad_text_class = 'ad_text_small';ad_url_class = 'ad_url_small';} else {ad_title_class = 'ad_title';ad_text_class = 'ad_text';ad_url_class = 'ad_url';}for(var i=0; i < google_ads.length; i++) {s += '<div class="ad_no_background"><a class="' + ad_title_class + '" href="' + google_ads[i].url + '" target="_blank">' +google_ads[i].line1 + '</a> - <span class="' + ad_text_class + '">' +google_ads[i].line2 + ' ' +google_ads[i].line3 + '</span> ' +'<a class="' + ad_url_class + '" href="' + google_ads[i].url + '" target="_blank" >' +google_ads[i].visible_url + '</a></div><div class="ad_label"><a class="ad_attrheadbelow" href="'+google_info.feedback_url+'" target="_blank">Ads by Google</a></div></div>';}}document.write(s);return;}// --></script><script type="text/javascript"><!--/** This section is responsible for setting the parameters of the ad call* Customize this section to your needs with input from your account manager*/// The following parameters should be modified appropriatelygoogle_ad_client = 'ca-hindu_site_html'; // substitute your client_idgoogle_ad_channel = '6568152145'; // substitute your channelgoogle_ad_output = 'js'; // leave this value as jsgoogle_max_num_ads = '1'; // specify the number of maximum adsgoogle_ad_type = 'text'; // type of ads to display - text,image,flash,htmlgoogle_safe = 'high'; // specify the ad safetygoogle_feedback = 'on';// The following parameter is required if you are displaying image, Flash or rich media ads.google_image_size = '468x60'; // the size of the ad block// The following parameters are options you can specify as necessary// google_encoding = 'utf8'; // specify the output language of the ads// google_language = 'en'; // override the default page language// The following parameter should be used only during testing// google_adtest = 'on'; // remove this line on launch day// --></script><!--/** The JavaScript returned from the following page uses* the parameter values assigned above to populate an array* of ad objects. Once that array has been populated,* the JavaScript will call the google_ad_request_done* function to display the ads.*/--><script type="text/javascript" src="http://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/show_ads.js"></script><script type="text/javascript">var addthis_pub = "thehindu";</script><span class="artauthor"><ul><li>Staff Reporter</li></ul></span>	<div class="detail-info"><div class="article-links"><a href="?css=print" title="Print">print</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;·&nbsp;&nbsp; <a href="" style="color:#aeaeae;" title="Change Text Size" id="inc" class="defaultSize">T</a>&nbsp;<a href="" style="font-size:18px;" title="Change Text Size" id="inc" class="largeSize">T</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;<script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">var min=8;var max=18;var min1=18;var max1=24; /* set cookie functions */function setCookie (name,value,days) {if (days){var date = new Date();date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));var expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();}else var expires = "";document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";}function getCookie (name) {var nameEQ = name + "=";var ca = document.cookie.split(';');for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++){var c = ca[i];while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);}return null;}function increaseFontSize(e) {e.preventDefault();$(this).css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".defaultSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});var temp=document.getElementById('inc').innerHTMLvar p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {if(p[i].style.fontSize) {var s = parseInt(p[i].style.fontSize.replace("px",""));} else {var s = 18;}if(s!=max) {s = 18;}if(p[i].style.lineHeight) {var t = parseInt(p[i].style.lineHeight.replace("px","")); } else {var t = 24; }if(t!=max1) {t = 24; } p[i].style.fontSize = s+"px"p[i].style.lineHeight = t+"px"} // save the font size in a cookie for one daysetCookie('fontsize', s, 1);setCookie('lineheight', t, 1);}function decreaseFontSize(e) {e.preventDefault();var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');	$(this).css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".largeSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});	for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {if(p[i].style.fontSize) {var s = parseInt(p[i].style.fontSize.replace("px",""));} else {var s = 14;}if(s!=min) {s =14;}if(p[i].style.lineHeight) {var t = parseInt(p[i].style.lineHeight.replace("px","")); } else {var t = 18; }if(t!=min1) {t = 18; } p[i].style.lineHeight = t+"px"p[i].style.fontSize = s+"px"} // save the font size in a cookie for one daysetCookie('fontsize', s, 1);setCookie('lineheight', t, 1);}$(document).ready(function() {// if the cookie exists, restore the variablevar fontsize = getCookie('fontsize');var lineheight = getCookie('lineheight'); if (fontsize) {var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {document.getElementsByTagName('p')[i].style.fontSize = fontsize + 'px' ; }if(fontsize > 16){$(".largeSize").css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".defaultSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});}}if (lineheight) {var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {document.getElementsByTagName('p')[i].style.lineHeight = lineheight + 'px' addthis_pill_style" title="Share via more services"></a></div>	</div>	<div class="line2"></div></div><div class="article-text"><div class="articleLead"><h2>509 drivers presented Chief Minister's Gold Medal</h2></div><div class="text-embed"><img src="http://www.thehindu.com/multimedia/dynamic/00511/25BGKSRTCAWARDS_GBO_511621e.jpg" class="main-image" alt="Chief Minister's Gold Medal recipients at a function in Bangalore on Thursday. — Photo: Sampath Kumar G.P." width="318" height="162" title="Chief Minister's Gold Medal recipients at a function in Bangalore on Thursday. — Photo: Sampath Kumar G.P."/><div class="photo-caption"><div class="photo-source"></div>Chief Minister's Gold Medal recipients at a function in Bangalore on Thursday. — Photo: Sampath Kumar G.P.</div></div><div class="article-body"><p class="body">The State Road Transport Corporations have decided to extend to trainee drivers and conductors medical treatment facility as applicable to regular employees and enhance their training allowances.</p><p class="body">Speaking at the presentation of Chief Minister's Gold Medals to drivers with an accident-free stint here, Home and Transport Minister R. Ashok said the training allowance for trainees in their first year will be increased from Rs. 1,000 to Rs. 1,400. </p><p class="body">For those in the second year of their training, the allowance will be increased from Rs. 600 to Rs. 900, he said. The four RTCs &#8212; Karnataka State Road Transport Corporation (KSRTC), Bangalore Metropolitan Transport Corporation (BMTC), North West KRTC and North East KRTC &#8212; will have to spend about Rs. 50 crore towards this enhancement, the Minister said.</p><p class="body">Meanwhile, these trainee drivers and conductors will be eligible to get medical facilities on a par with regular employees. This will cost the corporations about Rs. 4 crore annually, Mr. Ashok said.</p><p class="body">Presenting medals to 509 drivers for three years (2005 to 2007) Chief Minister B.S. Yeddyurappa urged the wives of corporation drivers and conductors to offer their children the best of the education and take them to new avenues of employment and entrepreneurship.</p><p class="body"/><script type="text/javascript">$(function() {$('#articleKeywords a').click( function() { var keyword = $(this).text();if (keyword.indexOf(' ') != -1)$('input#searchString').attr("value", '"' + keyword + '"');else$('input#searchString').attr("value", keyword);$('#simpleSearchForm').submit();return false;});});</script><div id="articleKeywords"><p></p></div><div class="clear"> type="text/javascript">var min=8;var max=18;var min1=18;var max1=24; /* set cookie functions */function setCookie (name,value,days) {if (days){var date = new Date();date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));var expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();}else var expires = "";document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";}function getCookie (name) {var nameEQ = name + "=";var ca = document.cookie.split(';');for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++){var c = ca[i];while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);}return null;}function increaseFontSize(e) {e.preventDefault();$(this).css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".defaultSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});var temp=document.getElementById('inc').innerHTMLvar p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {if(p[i].style.fontSize) {var s = parseInt(p[i].style.fontSize.replace("px",""));} else {var s = 18;}if(s!=max) {s = 18;}if(p[i].style.lineHeight) {var t = parseInt(p[i].style.lineHeight.replace("px","")); } else {var t = 24; }if(t!=max1) {t = 24; } p[i].style.fontSize = s+"px"p[i].style.lineHeight = t+"px"} // save the font size in a cookie for one daysetCookie('fontsize', s, 1);setCookie('lineheight', t, 1);}function decreaseFontSize(e) {e.preventDefault();var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');	$(this).css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".largeSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});	for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {if(p[i].style.fontSize) {var s = parseInt(p[i].style.fontSize.replace("px",""));} else {var s = 14;}if(s!=min) {s =14;}if(p[i].style.lineHeight) {var t = parseInt(p[i].style.lineHeight.replace("px","")); } else {var t = 18; }if(t!=min1) {t = 18; } p[i].style.lineHeight = t+"px"p[i].style.fontSize = s+"px"} // save the font size in a cookie for one daysetCookie('fontsize', s, 1);setCookie('lineheight', t, 1);}$(document).ready(function() {// if the cookie exists, restore the variablevar fontsize = getCookie('fontsize');var lineheight = getCookie('lineheight'); if (fontsize) {var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {document.getElementsByTagName('p')[i].style.fontSize = fontsize + 'px' ; }if(fontsize > 16){$(".largeSize").css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".defaultSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});}}if (lineheight) {var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {document.getElementsByTagName('p')[i].style.lineHeight = lineheight + 'px' title="Share via more services"></a></div>	</div>	<div class="line2"></div></div><div class="article-text"><div class="articleLead"><h2>Chaos in central business district evens out towards afternoon</h2></div><div class="text-embed"><img src="http://www.thehindu.com/multimedia/dynamic/00511/24bgdpkTraffic_G3U2_511616e.jpg" class="main-image" alt="LIKE THE GOOD OLD DAYS: This was the arterial Kasturba Road on Thursday afternoon when the India-Australia match was under way. — PHOTO: BHAGYA PRAKASH K." width="318" height="180" title="LIKE THE GOOD OLD DAYS: This was the arterial Kasturba Road on Thursday afternoon when the India-Australia match was under way. — PHOTO: BHAGYA PRAKASH K."/><div class="photo-caption"><div class="photo-source"></div>LIKE THE GOOD OLD DAYS: This was the arterial Kasturba Road on Thursday afternoon when the India-Australia match was under way. — PHOTO: BHAGYA PRAKASH K.</div></div><div class="article-body"><p class="body">Roads around Bangalore wore a largely deserted look all afternoon and the better part of Thursday evening, courtesy the all-important Cricket World Cup match between India and Australia. </p><p class="body">Roads that are most crowded, choked with traffic jams by evening, saw smooth rides for the weary Bangalorean, quite in contrast with the maddening and slow-moving traffic that central roads of the city witnessed in the morning. </p><p class="body"><b>Total closure</b></p><p class="body">With Cubbon Road closed completely between CTO junction and BRV junction both ways &#8212; on Wednesday it was blocked only on one side &#8212; the traffic situation only worsened. Traffic on Queen's Road, which is suddenly seeing heavy influx of vehicles given the new diversions, moved at a snail's pace for a good three hours in the morning. Traffic was practically stagnant on this road. Also, on Hospital Road in Shivajinagar, traffic was heavier than usual. </p><p class="body">Commuters going from Cubbon Road towards Minsk Square now have to go through Anil Kumble Circle and Queen's Circle, thereby clogging both these roads.</p><p class="body">Additional Commissioner of Police (Traffic) Praveen Sood told <i>The Hindu</i> vehicles had piled upon Queen's Road on account of the complete closure of Cubbon Road stretch between CTO and BRV junction on Thursday, in contrast to partial closure the day before.</p><p class="body"><b>A fortnight</b></p><p class="body">He said the movement of traffic will even out in the next 15 days when motorists identify their own alternative routes to reach their destination. &#8220;However, much the traffic police seek to create awareness on alternative routes, motorists will prefer to figure out their own routes through experimentation,&#8221; he said.</p><p class="body">He advised motorists to start using M.G. Road, where the civil works are almost complete. </p><script type="text/javascript">$(function() {$('#articleKeywords a').click( function() { var keyword = $(this).text();if (keyword.indexOf(' ') != -1)$('input#searchString').attr("value", '"' + keyword + '"');else$('input#searchString').attr("value", keyword);$('#simpleSearchForm').submit();return false;});});</script><div using ad skipvar google_num_ads = 0;var google_last_ad_type = '';function google_ad_request_done(google_ads) {/** This function is required and is used to display* the ads that are returned from the JavaScript* request. You should modify the document.write* commands so that the HTML they write out fits* with your desired ad layout.*/var s;/** Verify that there are actually ads to display.*/if (google_ads.length == 0)return;google_num_ads += google_ads.length;google_last_ad_type = google_ads[0].type;/** If an image or Flash ad is returned, display that ad.* If a rich media ad is returned, display that as "as is."* Otherwise, build a string containing all of the ads and* then use a document.write() command to print that string.*/s = '<div id="google-ad-border">';if (google_ads[0].type == "image") {s += '<a href="' + google_ads[0].url +'" target="_top" title="go to ' + google_ads[0].visible_url +'"><img border="0" src="' + google_ads[0].image_url +'"width="' + google_ads[0].image_width +'"height="' + google_ads[0].image_height + '"></a>';}else if (google_ads[0].type == "flash") {s += '<object classid="clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000"' +' codebase="http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,0,0"' +' WIDTH="' + google_ad.image_width +'" HEIGHT="' + google_ad.image_height + '">' +'<PARAM NAME="movie" VALUE="' + google_ad.image_url + '">' +'<PARAM NAME="quality" VALUE="high">' +'<PARAM NAME="AllowScriptAccess" VALUE="never">' +'<EMBED src="' + google_ad.image_url +'" WIDTH="' + google_ad.image_width +'" HEIGHT="' + google_ad.image_height +'" TYPE="application/x-shockwave-flash"' +' AllowScriptAccess="never" ' +' PLUGINSPAGE="http://www.macromedia.com/go/getflashplayer"></EMBED></OBJECT>';}else if (google_ads[0].type == "html") {s += google_ads[0].snippet;}else if (google_ads[0].type == "text") {// Adjust text sizes to occupy the majority of ad space.if (google_ads.length == 1) {ad_title_class = 'ad_title_small';ad_text_class = 'ad_text_small';ad_url_class = 'ad_url_small';} else {ad_title_class = 'ad_title';ad_text_class = 'ad_text';ad_url_class = 'ad_url';}for(var i=0; i < google_ads.length; i++) {s += '<div class="ad_no_background"><a class="' + ad_title_class + '" href="' + google_ads[i].url + '" target="_blank">' +google_ads[i].line1 + '</a> - <span class="' + ad_text_class + '">' +google_ads[i].line2 + ' ' +google_ads[i].line3 + '</span> ' +'<a class="' + ad_url_class + '" href="' + google_ads[i].url + '" target="_blank" >' +google_ads[i].visible_url + '</a></div><div class="ad_label"><a class="ad_attrheadbelow" href="'+google_info.feedback_url+'" target="_blank">Ads by Google</a></div></div>';}}document.write(s);return;}// --></script><script type="text/javascript"><!--/** This section is responsible for setting the parameters of the ad call* Customize this section to your needs with input from your account manager*/// The following parameters should be modified appropriatelygoogle_ad_client = 'ca-hindu_site_html'; // type of ads to display - text,image,flash,htmlgoogle_safe = 'high'; // specify the ad safetygoogle_feedback = 'on';// The following parameter is required if you are displaying image, Flash or rich media ads.google_image_size = '468x60'; type="text/javascript">var min=8;var max=18;var min1=18;var max1=24; /* set cookie functions */function setCookie (name,value,days) {if (days){var date = new Date();date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));var expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();}else var expires = "";document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";}function getCookie (name) {var nameEQ = name + "=";var ca = document.cookie.split(';');for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++){var c = ca[i];while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);}return null;}function increaseFontSize(e) {e.preventDefault();$(this).css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".defaultSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});var temp=document.getElementById('inc').innerHTMLvar p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {if(p[i].style.fontSize) {var s = parseInt(p[i].style.fontSize.replace("px",""));} else {var s = 18;}if(s!=max) {s = 18;}if(p[i].style.lineHeight) {var t = parseInt(p[i].style.lineHeight.replace("px","")); } else {var t = 24; }if(t!=max1) {t = 24; } p[i].style.fontSize = s+"px"p[i].style.lineHeight = t+"px"} // save the font size in a cookie for one daysetCookie('fontsize', s, 1);setCookie('lineheight', t, 1);}function decreaseFontSize(e) {e.preventDefault();var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');	$(this).css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".largeSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});	for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {if(p[i].style.fontSize) {var s = parseInt(p[i].style.fontSize.replace("px",""));} else {var s = 14;}if(s!=min) {s =14;}if(p[i].style.lineHeight) {var t = parseInt(p[i].style.lineHeight.replace("px","")); } else {var t = 18; }if(t!=min1) {t = 18; } p[i].style.lineHeight = t+"px"p[i].style.fontSize = s+"px"} // save the font size in a cookie for one daysetCookie('fontsize', s, 1);setCookie('lineheight', t, 1);}$(document).ready(function() {// if the cookie exists, restore the variablevar fontsize = getCookie('fontsize');var lineheight = getCookie('lineheight'); if (fontsize) {var p = 16){$(".largeSize").css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".defaultSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});}}if (lineheight) {var p = Pichumani"/><div class="photo-caption"><div class="photo-source"></div>The accident occurred in the early hours when the family was sleeping —Photo: K. Pichumani</div></div><div class="article-body"><p class="body">A family of four, including two children were injured, after a section of the ceiling of a room in their flat came crashing down while they were asleep in the early hours of Tuesday.</p><p class="body">Sources with the Puzhal police said the accident took place at the first-floor flat owned by Balakrishnan at Hari Om apartment complex, built over a year ago, in Janakiraman Nagar, Puthagaram in Puzhal.</p><p class="body">Concrete pieces from the ceiling fell on Balakrishnan, his wife Kalaichelvi and their children, Prithiviraj and Oviya, around 3.30 a.m. The sound and the ensuing chaos woke the neighbours, and the family was rushed to a private hospital in Anna Nagar. All four are out of danger.</p><p class="body">The apartment was constructed a year ago. Suspecting that poor quality construction material could have caused the accident, the Puzhal police have registered a case.</p><script type="text/javascript">$(function() {$('#articleKeywords <a href="" style="color:#aeaeae;" title="Change Text Size" id="inc" class="defaultSize">T</a>&nbsp;<a href="" style="font-size:18px;" title="Change Text Size" id="inc" class="largeSize">T</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;<script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">var min=8;var max=18;var min1=18;var max1=24; /* set cookie functions */function setCookie (name,value,days) {if (days){var date = new Date();date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));var expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();}else var expires = "";document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";}function getCookie (name) {var nameEQ = name + "=";var ca = document.cookie.split(';');for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++){var c = ca[i];while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);}return null;}function increaseFontSize(e) {e.preventDefault();$(this).css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".defaultSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});var temp=document.getElementById('inc').innerHTMLvar p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {if(p[i].style.fontSize) {var s = parseInt(p[i].style.fontSize.replace("px",""));} else {var s = 18;}if(s!=max) {s = 18;}if(p[i].style.lineHeight) {var t = parseInt(p[i].style.lineHeight.replace("px","")); } else {var t = 24; }if(t!=max1) {t = 24; } p[i].style.fontSize = s+"px"p[i].style.lineHeight = t+"px"} // save the font size in a cookie for one daysetCookie('fontsize', s, 1);setCookie('lineheight', t, 1);}function decreaseFontSize(e) {e.preventDefault();var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');	$(this).css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".largeSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});	for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {if(p[i].style.fontSize) {var s = parseInt(p[i].style.fontSize.replace("px",""));} else {var s = 14;}if(s!=min) {s =14;}if(p[i].style.lineHeight) {var t = parseInt(p[i].style.lineHeight.replace("px","")); } else {var t = 18; }if(t!=min1) {t = 18; } p[i].style.lineHeight = t+"px"p[i].style.fontSize = s+"px"} // save the font size in a cookie for one daysetCookie('fontsize', s, 1);setCookie('lineheight', t, 1);}$(document).ready(function() {// if the cookie exists, restore the variablevar fontsize = getCookie('fontsize');var lineheight = getCookie('lineheight'); if (fontsize) {var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {document.getElementsByTagName('p')[i].style.fontSize = fontsize + 'px' ; }if(fontsize > 16){$(".largeSize").css({'color':"#aeaeae","cursor":"default"});	$(".defaultSize").css({'color':"#1F57A5","cursor":"pointer"});}}if (lineheight) {var p = document.getElementsByTagName('p');for(i=0;i<p.length;i++) {document.getElementsByTagName('p')[i].style.lineHeight = lineheight + 'px' }}$(".defaultSize").click(decreaseFontSize);$(".largeSize").click(increaseFontSize);});</script><NOSCRIPT><a href="http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-national/tp-otherstates/cracker-explosion-leads-to-fire/article164113.ece?textsize=large&test=1" title="Large Text Size" >T+</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;·&nbsp;&nbsp; }}</script> <div id="topShare"><div id="addsharetop"><div class="fshare"><div class="fb-like" data-href="http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-national/tp-otherstates/cracker-explosion-leads-to-fire/article164113.ece" data-send="true" data-layout="button_count" data-show-faces="true" data-font="arial"> </div></div><div class="twit">	<a href="https://twitter.com/share" class="twitter-share-button" data-url="http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-national/tp-otherstates/article164113.ece" data-count="horizontal">Tweet</a></div><div class="gplus">	<g:plusone size="medium"></g:plusone></div><div class="inShare floatLeft"><script src="//platform.linkedin.com/in.js" type="text/javascript"> lang: en_US</script><script type="IN/Share" data-url="http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-national/tp-otherstates/cracker-explosion-leads-to-fire/article164113.ece" data-counter="right"></script></div><div class="twit1"><script type="text/javascript">var addthis_config = {"data_track_clickback":true, ui_click: true,services_compact: 'email, favorites, gmail, hotmail, blogger, instapaper, wordpress, more',services_exclude: 'facebook,twitter',data_ga_property: 'UA-10158580-1',data_ga_social: true}</script><a href="http://addthis.com/bookmark.php?v=250&amp;username=thehindu" class="addthis_counter addthis_pill_style" title="Share via more services"></a></div>	</div>	<div class="line2"></div></div><div class="article-text"><div class="articleLead"></div><p class="body">Staff Reporter</p><p class="body"><i> Many suffer burns during Diwali celebrations in the State </i></p> <p class="body">BHUBANESWAR: A large number of people were rushed to different hospitals after sustaining injuries in cracker accidents during diwali celebration in the State on Saturday. Properties worth more than Rs. 50 lakhs were gutted when a major fire was caused by cracker explosion in a slum near port town of Paradip. Though no casualty was reported, people of the slum in Atharbanki area who trade fish lost everything in the fire. Nearly, 60 houses turned into ashes in a few hours. </p><p class="body">Similarly, two buses caught fire at Rasulgarh Square in the capital city. The reasons behind the accident could not be ascertained.</p><p class="body">A person identified as Prakash Biswal succumbed to burn injuries when his wooden cabin was hit by a cracker in Bhadrak district. The roadside shop was being used for storing petrol and it was suspected that the inflammable substance caught fire in no time. </p><p class="body">During past 24 hours, more than 100 patients with mainly burn injuries were admitted to the Capital Hospital here. While most of them were let off after being given the first aid, two critically persons were referred to a hospital in Cuttack. </p><p class="body">The SCB Medical College Hospital too received a large number of patients who suffered injuries in cracker accidents from Cuttack and nearby districts.</p><p class="body"><b> Traditional fervour</b></p> <p class="body">Despite a number of accidents, diwali was celebrated with traditional gaiety and fervour. People fire crackers till late evening as holiday (Sunday) was to follow the diwali. Residential colonies wore a new look in the evening with flickering lights of (earthen lamps) diya lighted up whole areas in capital city. During the daytime, the holy town of Puri witnessed lakhs of devotees. </p><script type="text/javascript">$(function() {$('#articleKeywords a').click( function() { var keyword = $(this).text();if (keyword.indexOf(' ') != -1)$('input#searchString').attr("value", '"' + keyword + '"');else$('input#searchString').attr("value", keyword);$('#simpleSearchForm').submit();return false;});});</script><div id="articleKeywords"><p></p></div><div class="noline"></div><div class="amzn" style="margin-bottom:15px; width:100%;"><center><!-- Javascript tag: --><!-- begin ZEDO for
